string.text: artifacts,trading,loner
Brothers, found a stash of artifacts near the Garbage. Anyone interested in splitting the haul?
You know we loners share when we can. Count me in.
Good to hear. Meet me at the old gas station. We'll divide it fair and square.
That's what I like about us free stalkers - we look out for each other.
survival,advice,loner
New guy here. Any fellow loners got tips for surviving solo?
First rule of being a free stalker: trust nobody completely, but help when you can.
Got it. Stay sharp and keep moving.
bandits,ambush,loner
Heard bandits laying traps around the old collapsed bunker. They’ve got tripwires and flashbangs—stay sharp.
That bunker’s a deathtrap now. Move slow, check every corner.
Understood. I’ll stick to the perimeter and use my detector for anomalies.
Good thinking. Bandits hate surprises almost as much as anomalies.
military,patrol,loner
Military’s stepped up patrols by Yanov railway yard, snipers on the rooftop and buried sensors.
Great. You got any passes? They’re scanning IDs with handheld scanners now.
Only forged papers that still raise eyebrows. Thinking of skipping that sector entirely.
Better to cross through the old sewage tunnels, cold and smelly, but they won’t check down there.
checkpoint,avoidance,loner
That new military checkpoint on the north bridge is clogging the route. Anyone know a back trail?
Use the service road through the mine shaft entrance,dark and winding, but you’ll skip the guards.
Copy that. Hope the mutants haven’t made a nest down there.
If they did, they’re more afraid of you than you of them—just watch for echoes.
loot,military,loner
Found a stash of military-grade ammo in an abandoned guard post, enough rounds for a heavy machine gun.
Not bad. You selling or trading for supplies?
I’m swapping for med-kits and radiation filters, don’t need more bullets stored on my back.
Smart move. Ammo’s heavy and can paint a target on your back in the wrong hands.
bandits,ambush,loner,warning
Heard bandits rigged tripwires around the old collapsed bunker, came back to find a mate bleeding out.
%speaker_first_name%, they’re using flashbangs too, light up the blind spots and pounce.
Flashbangs? Damn. I’ll need to pack extra earplugs and keep low.
Yeah, and watch for loose cables, some wired to explosives. Move slow, check every step.
Got it. Might send a dog first, see if it triggers anything.
Risky. Those bandits train dogs to run back, setting off traps when you’re near.
Fair point. Maybe a rock throw to trigger from distance, then dash in.
Smart. After the blast, grab whatever loot you can, then vanish before they regroup.
Sounds like a plan. Thanks for the heads-up, won’t forget this one.
military,patrol,stealth,loner
Heard military’s set up new patrols by the Yanov rail yard, snipers on the roofs and motion sensors in the yard.
You got any intel on their shift changes?
Around midnight is quietest, the sensors go into standby for maintenance checks.
Midnight run, then. What about the dogs?
They kennel them near the east wall, avoid that side, or use a silenced pistol if you have to.
Got my old suppressed Vintorez, should do the trick.
Good. Move under the cover of the railway cars, avoid open ground.
Understood. In and out before the next sweep.
bandits,cordon,loner,warning
Anyone else notice bandits popping up around the Cordon checkpoint more often these days?
%speaker_first_name%, I’ve seen squads of them camping by the railway embankment at dusk.
They’re getting bolder, jumping lone stalkers on the supply path near the old boiler house.
Yeah, and they’ve rigged tripwires in the tall grass east of the checkpoint. Caught my friend off guard.
Those cowards. Hit you while you’re down, then vanish into the trees with your gear.
We need to clear them out, no sense letting Cordon turn into their playground.
Agreed. I’ll scout their camp at first light and mark any traps.
Good plan. I’ll bring some smoke grenades and cover your exit, make them scatter like rats.
bandits,camp,cordon,loner
Passed by that hollowed out silo west of the Cordon, bandits are using it as a makeshift camp now.
%speaker_first_name%, I saw smoke rising last night, figured it was just a forest fire.
Nope, heard them shouting orders, got at least a dozen in there armed with everything they stole.
We should hit them before they dig in further. There is no telling when they will start taxing stalkers.
Agreed. I will slip in under cover of fog and plant some charges by the food barrels.
I will circle south and block their retreat, no one gets away with our gear.
Alright. Meet at the old water tower at 0300. Keep it quiet and quick.
military,deserters,info,loner
Heard a couple of military deserters set up near the cornfield to trade intel for extra rations.
Deserters? They must be running low on supplies if they are talking to loners.
Yeah, they have maps of patrol routes in Yanov but their scope is scratched to pieces.
Could be useful. I might trade them some ammo for a fresh look at those maps.
Just watch your back. Deserters flip sides fast when the Zone gets too hot.
True. I will approach cautiously, offer them filtered water first, then see if they are legit.
Solid. If they double cross we will know before they even draw their weapons.
bandits,raid,cordon,loner
Heard those bandit fuckers raided our cache by the old boiler house before first light.
%speaker_first_name%, they blew the lock off with a grenade and cleared us out in minutes.
Jesus. They must have had inside info or a scout watching our shifts.
They did. Saw one of our own trailing them last week and talking too friendly.
Betrayal cuts deeper than a bullet. We need to burn that informant’s ass.
I agree. Tonight at midnight we hit their camp by the railway embankment.
I will rig some flashbangs at their perimeter then lure them into the clearing.
Good plan. I will circle south and seal off their exit. No one walks away with our gear.
anomalies,warning,loner
Heads up heard a flicker anomaly near the north bunker just past the willow grove.
%speaker_first_name%, that anomaly tears your kit apart if you get too close.
I lost a filter and a detector walking through its edge last week.
Best skirt it wide use your compass and stick to the trench line.
Agreed I will mark it on my map and warn any lone runners I meet.
Good thinking nothing worse than watching your buddy fry for a shiny bit.
artifacts,barter,loner
Picked up a weird heat pack artifact near the shovel zone thinking of trading it.
%speaker_first_name%, heat packs fetch a good price with that Doc at the Mobile Lab.
Doc offloads filters medkits and sometimes ammo no questions asked.
I want two filters and a full medkit pack if he will.
I can swing by his truck on my next run through the Cordon and broker the deal.
Solid let us meet at the derelict watchtower at dusk he likes low light deals.
Understood I will bring extra ammo just in case he gets greedy.
supplies,morale,loner
Rations are almost gone I have two cans of fish left and a half bottle of water.
%speaker_first_name%, I feel you I have one medkit and no filters.
We need to hit that supply droppoint by the old radio tower tomorrow morning.
That droppoint is crawling with Duty patrols now they check every pack.
Then we ghost through the drainage ditch behind the hill keep low and quiet.
If we snag a couple medkits and filters I will owe you one.
No debts between loners trade favors not IOUs.
mutant,escape,strategy,loner
Nearly got jumped by a pack of snorks near the abandoned factory. Those bastards are learning to flank.
You still breathing? What was your exit strategy?
Ducked into that underground pipe network. They won't follow through narrow spaces.
Smart play. Just watch for bloodsuckers down there. Heard they nest in the deeper sections.
radiation,hotspot,warning,loner
Heads up - the northern swamp sector's radiation levels spiked overnight. My detector maxed out at 500 roentgen.
Shit. That's where I was headed for artifact hunting. Alternative routes?
Stick to the railroad embankment. Longer but safer. Bring extra iodine.
Appreciate the warning. Almost walked into a death trap.
stash,discovery,sharing,loner
Found an untouched military stash under the collapsed bridge. Ammo, meds, even some grenades.
You sharing coordinates or keeping it to yourself?
Marking it on the shared map. But hurry - Duty scouts are patrolling nearby.
That's why I love this community. Paying it forward saves lives.
emission,aftermath,help,loner
That last emission scrambled half my gear. Anyone got spare bolts or detector parts?
I've got extra bolts. Meet at the usual spot. You still owe me from the snork incident though.
Fair enough. Bringing that artifact fragment I promised as payment.
Deal. And I'll throw in some bandages - you look like shit.
barter,economy,trading,loner
What's the current exchange rate? Got 5.45 ammo but need 9x39 for my Vintorez.
Three to one last I checked. Better off trading for filters first, then swapping those.
Ugh. This is why I miss pre-emission markets. Anyone seen Sidorovich lately?
Alive but paranoid. Demands blood tests before trading now. Radiation paranoia.
newbie,advice,survival,loner
Fresh meat here. Any veteran stalkers willing to share essential Zone wisdom?
Rule one: Trust your detector more than your eyes. Rule two: Never run toward gunfire.
Noted.
And for Christ's sake, check your six constantly. The Zone kills the careless.
false_alarm,relief,loner
Thought I saw Monolith scouts near the sawmill. Nearly shit myself.
And?
Just Freedom idiots in stolen armor. Nearly blew their heads off before recognizing the patches.
Those morons are gonna get themselves killed playing dress-up.
repair,gear,help,loner
My detector's acting up after that electrical anomaly. Anyone good with electronics?
Try reseating the crystal contacts. Common issue after EMP-type exposures.
Already did. Still giving false negatives on grav anomalies.
Bring it by my camp. Got a spare multimeter. Payment in ammo or filters.
lore,rumors,history,loner
Heard an old tale about the X-7 lab. Some say the first emission originated there.
Bullshit. Everyone knows it was the CNPP reactor. The lab was just another failed experiment.
Then why do all artifacts near X-7 test positive for unique isotopes?
...Okay, that's actually interesting. Maybe worth investigating.
watch,shift,security,loner
Taking first watch tonight. Saw fresh boot prints near the perimeter.
Bandits or worse?
Could be military scouts. Prints had that distinctive tread pattern.
I'll take second watch then. Two sets of eyes better than one.
food,scarcity,hunting,loner
Down to my last ration pack. Any good hunting grounds that aren't mutant-infested?
West of the rail yard. Boars still roam there, and the meat tests clean.
Watch for snorks though. They've started hunting the same herds.
Always something. Thanks for the tip - I'll take my silenced rifle.
injury,recovery,help,loner
Took a graze from a bandit ambush. Nothing serious but my medkits expired.
You at the old depot? I've got fresh bandages and antiseptic.
Yeah, holed up in the guard shack. Door's rigged with a tin can alarm.
On my way. Save me some of that vodka you're definitely drinking.
missing,search,remembrance,loner
Anyone seen Markov? Was supposed to meet at the checkpoint three days ago.
Last spotted heading toward the chemical plant. That was before the emission though.
Damn. He knew the risks but... he was a good stalker.
Toast his memory at the campfire tonight. Zone claims us all eventually.
sighting,strange,rumor,loner
Saw something... weird near the dead city. Like a stalker, but moving all wrong.
Another Monolith fanatic?
No. This was different. Glitchy, like a broken hologram. Then it just... vanished.
Lay off the vodka before patrols. But... I've heard similar stories lately.
artifact,discovery,danger,loner
Found a cluster of Sparklers in the anomaly field near the construction site. Never seen so many in one place.
That's the third report this week. The Zone is coughing up artifacts like never before.
Yeah, and that's what worries me. Last time this happened was right before the '06 blowout.
Then we stock up while we can. I'm making one last run before sunset.
betrayal,caution,trust,loner
Watch out for a stalker called "Viper". Turned in two loners to Duty for the bounty last night.
What? He shared our campfire just three days ago!
Mark his description - red sunrise patch on his backpack. Word is he's working with the traders now.
Another reason to trust only your rifle and your detector in the Zone.
equipment,modification,advice,loner
Anyone know how to stabilize a Gauss rifle without the proper parts? Mine's kicking like a mule.
Try wrapping the barrel with rubber strips from old tires. Cuts vibration by 40%.
Where'd you learn that trick?
Ex-military engineer. The Zone makes improvisers of us all.
dreams,zone,psychic,loner
Been having... strange dreams since that last emission. Like the Zone is whispering.
Not this shit again. Next you'll be preaching about the Monolith.
No, not like that. More like... patterns. Like it's trying to show me safe routes.
Get your head checked at the ecologist camp. Radiation psychosis starts subtle.
traps,bandits,warning,loner
Bandits are rigging abandoned stashes now. Saw two rookies get blown sky high near the car park.
Old tactic. Always scan for tripwires and pressure plates before approaching.
These were new - motion sensors hooked to RPG rounds. Military grade shit.
Then we spread the word. And maybe leave some... surprises of our own along their routes.
bunker,discovery,history,loner
Found an intact Soviet-era bunker under the old farmhouse. Walls are lined with lead - perfect emission shelter.
Claimed or up for grabs?
Shared space. Left the coordinates at the 100 Rads bulletin board. Just don't trash the place.
Real stalker spirit. I'll bring some supplies to stock it next time I pass through.
mutant,evolution,danger,loner
Bloodsuckers are changing. Saw one phase through a solid wall near Yantar.
Bullshit. They're fast, not ghostly.
Wish I was joking. My bullet passed right through it before it solidified again.
If the mutants are evolving, we need new tactics. Flamethrowers might be the only answer now.
faction,tensions,warning,loner
Duty and Freedom are gearing up for another skirmish near the army warehouses.
Great. Just when artifact hunting was getting good there.
Word is they're conscripting loners at gunpoint now. Avoid the area for a week.
Thanks for the heads up. I'll reroute through the swamps.
technology,discovery,danger,loner
Found a weird device in the X-18 lab. Looks like a detector but shows... something else.
Turn it off. Now. That's psy-tech from the C-Con project.
Too late. It... showed me things. The structure of the Zone. Like a map but alive.
Get to the ecologists immediately. That's how the Monolith recruits start.
sidorovich,trading,complaints,loner
%speaker_first_name%, just came from Sidorovich. That fat bastard offered me 2000 rubles for a Jellyfish artifact.
He tried the same shit with me last week. Said the market was "oversaturated."
Meanwhile he's charging triple for basic medkits. How's a stalker supposed to survive?
That's why I started trading with the ecologists directly. Better rates, less bullshit.
Until you need ammo at 3 AM and they're all asleep in their bunker.
True. Sidorovich may be a leech, but he's our leech.
military,duty,politics,loner
Saw military patrols sharing intel with Duty near the checkpoint. They're getting cozy.
%speaker_first_name%, those fascists deserve each other. Both want to control everything.
Next thing you know, they'll be setting up joint checkpoints to tax us harder.
Let them try. We know every rat hole and tunnel in the Zone.
Still, it's worrying. United, they could squeeze us out of the good hunting grounds.
Then we remind them why free stalkers have survived this long. Adapt or die.
freedom,military,conflict,loner
Military's been sniffing around Freedom's warehouse, offering "protection" deals.
Ha! Freedom told them to fuck off, I hope?
Nah, some of the younger Freedom guys are considering it. Easy money, they say.
Sellouts. Freedom used to stand for something - keeping the Zone free.
%speaker_first_name%, everyone's got a price when rations run low.
Not us loners. We'd rather starve free than eat from their hand.
sidorovich,debt,humor,loner
%speaker_first_name%, Sidorovich says I owe him for that detector repair. Swears it was top-tier work.
Top-tier? He probably just hit it with a hammer and prayed.
Thing still beeps at shadows. Now he wants three artifacts as payment.
Tell him you'll pay when his "top-tier" work actually works.
I tried. He threatened to blacklist me from his vodka supply.
The ultimate threat. Guess you're artifact hunting tomorrow then.
duty,recruitment,warning,loner
Duty's recruiting hard. Offering signing bonuses and "guaranteed" safe sectors.
Yeah, guaranteed to get you killed following their suicide orders.
They cornered me yesterday, gave the whole "save humanity" speech.
What'd you tell them?
That I'd rather save myself, thanks. They didn't like that answer.
%speaker_first_name%, stay clear of their checkpoint for a while. They hold grudges.
faction,politics,independence,loner
Both Freedom and Duty keep trying to claim the factory district. It's getting ugly.
Let them fight. More artifacts for us while they play war.
Problem is they're hassling any loner who passes through, demanding loyalty oaths.
Loyalty? To what? Their stupid ideologies?
Exactly. I told them my only loyalty is to staying alive and getting paid.
The only honest answer in the Zone, %speaker_first_name%.
military,corruption,opportunity,loner
That military sergeant at the south checkpoint is dirty. Takes bribes for passage.
How much?
5000 rubles or a decent artifact. Cheaper than getting shot trying to sneak around.
That's really useful. What's his schedule?
Night shifts, Tuesday through Friday. Look for the one with the scarred left hand.
Information like this is why loners survive. We share what matters, thank you brat.
sidorovich,monopoly,alternatives,loner
We need to break Sidorovich's monopoly. His prices are getting insane.
Good luck with that. He's got connections everywhere.
What if we set up our own trading post? Pool resources, undercut his prices.
%speaker_first_name%, he'd sabotage us within a week. Remember what happened to Petrov?
Petrov tried to go solo. Together, we'd have a chance.
Maybe. But who'd run it? Trust is thin among loners.
duty,freedom,neutrality,loner
Duty patrol tried to conscript me yesterday. Freedom squad "rescued" me today. Both want gratitude.
Two sides of the same faction coin. What'd you do?
Told them both I had radiation sickness and ran like hell.
Ha! Classic. They probably argued about who contaminated you.
%speaker_first_name%, staying neutral is getting harder every day.
That's why we stick together. Loners don't need their wars.
military,duty,alliance,concern,loner
Rumours of Military and Duty signing some kind of cooperation agreement.
Shit. There goes half our smuggling routes.
Talk of running a joint patrol near the barrier.
This is bad, %speaker_first_name%. Real bad for independent operators.
Time to find new routes. The Zone's bigger than their ambitions.
Or we make their alliance... costly. Few well-placed incidents might cool their friendship.
Dangerous thinking, but might be necessary. The Zone belongs to no one.
anomaly,research,profit,loner
That gravitational anomaly cluster near the cement plant is pulsing differently. Might be spawning new artifacts.
You always chase theories. Last time cost me a good detector.
This is different. The readings match pre-emission patterns from 2011.
If you're right, we need to move fast. Duty's science team is sniffing around there.
Already scouted it. Best approach is through the flooded basement at dawn.
Split whatever we find 60-40? I'm taking the bigger risk going first.
Deal. But if it's a Goldfish or better, we negotiate.
zone,philosophy,survival,loner
Been thinking. We complain about factions, but aren't we just another tribe?
Lay off the philosopher's stone. We're individuals who sometimes cooperate.
But we share info, help wounded, trade fairly. That's more organized than bandits.
Key difference - I can tell you to fuck off without getting shot for insubordination.
Fair point. Freedom's just slavery with better PR anyway.
Now you're thinking like a proper loner. The Zone teaches, we just have to listen.
bandits,territory,warning,loner
Bandits took over the water tower near the truck cemetery. Demanding tolls from everyone.
Those parasites multiply like rats. How many?
Counted eight, but they're cocky. Drinking and fighting among themselves.
Perfect time to remind them why free stalkers survived this long.
I'm thinking smoke grenades and crossfire from the hill. Quick and dirty.
Count me in. Can't let them think we're easy marks.
Meet at the old bus stop after dark. Bring extra ammo.
military,avoidance,routes,loner
Military doubled patrols on the eastern road. Lost two rookies trying to slip through yesterday.
Shit. That was my main supply route.
There's an old drainage tunnel that goes under their checkpoint. Ankle-deep in radioactive sludge though.
Better than eating bullets. My rad pills can handle some exposure.
Move during shift change at 0600. They're sloppy for about ten minutes.
Thanks for the intel. We share these routes, we all survive longer.
bandit,retaliation,planning,loner
Those bandit fucks who robbed Petrov? Found their camp near the burnt village.
About time. Petrov was a good man, helped every rookie who asked.
Six of them, but they don't post guards. Too confident after their score.
Overconfidence kills more bandits than bullets. When do we move?
Tonight. I've got three others ready. Quick strike, take back what they stole.
And leave a message. Other bandits need to know - loners aren't easy prey.
economics,bartering,cooperation,loner
Setting up a swap meet at the old gas station tomorrow. Bring tradeable goods, no rubles needed.
Good idea. Cut out Sidorovich's markup for once.
I've got spare filters and some canned meat. Need 5.45 ammo badly.
I can cover that. Running low on detector batteries myself.
This is what makes us different from the factions. No bureaucracy, just fair trades.
Keep it quiet though. Don't want bandits crashing our market.
ecologists,cooperation,mutants,loner
Ecologists offering good money for mutant tissue samples. Easy work if you're already hunting.
How much we talking?
2000 for flesh samples, 5000 for bloodsucker tentacles, 8000 for controller brain tissue.
Controller brain? Might as well ask for a pseudogiant's heart.
They provide preservation kits. Makes transport easier.
Beats hauling artifacts through anomaly fields. I'm in.
military,corruption,opportunity,loner
Found a military quartermaster willing to trade. Wants artifacts, offers surplus gear.
Risky. What if it's a sting operation?
Nah, he's been doing it for months. Other stalkers vouch for him.
What kind of gear we talking about?
Military medkits, armor plates, sometimes ammunition. All "fell off the truck" of course.
Their corruption is our opportunity. Just keep it professional and quiet.
bandits,trap,warning,loner
Heads up - bandits are using fake distress calls on the radio. Almost walked into an ambush.
Those bastards have no honor. What frequency?
145.75. Female voice claiming to be wounded near the old mill.
Sick fucks. Using our own compassion against us.
Spread the word. No more rescue runs without verification.
This is why we can't have nice things in the Zone.
zone,mystery,investigation,loner
Found something weird. A room in the factory that wasn't there last month.
You sure you got the right building? Easy to get turned around.
Positive. I've been using that route for two years. This room just... appeared.
The Zone shifts sometimes. Spaces fold in on themselves.
There were fresh supplies inside. Like someone stocked it yesterday.
Don't trust it. The Zone doesn't give gifts without a price.
Already grabbed what I could and ran. Not going back alone.
weather,survival,preparation,loner
Storm front moving in from the north. Looks like a bad one - might trigger anomaly shifts.
Just what we need. My last dry matches got soaked yesterday.
Check the abandoned metro entrance. Usually stays dry there.
Good call. We should mark more storm shelters on the shared map.
Already started. Knowledge shared is lives saved.
artifact,market,trading,loner
Artifact prices are crashing. Too many rookies flooding the market with Sparklers.
Let them. Real money's in the rare stuff now - Mamas Beads, Fireflies.
If you can find them. Competition's fierce near the good anomalies.
That's why I hunt at night. Fewer eyes, better odds.
And more mutants. Your funeral, brother.
Better than starving. This is the life we chose.
bandit,justice,revenge,loner
Remember those bandits who killed Sasha last week? Found two of them drunk at the 100 Rads.
And?
Let's just say they won't be robbing anyone anymore.
Good. Sasha helped every rookie who came through. He deserved better.
Left their patches as a warning. Other bandits need to know we remember.
Zone justice. It's all we have.
rookie,advice,mentoring,loner
Got three rookies asking me about artifact hunting. The stories really draw them in.
Tell them the truth - 90% boredom, 9% terror, 1% profit.
I showed them Yuri's grave. He thought he knew better than his detector.
Harsh but necessary. The Zone doesn't forgive ignorance.
One still wants to try. Kid's got determination at least.
Then teach him right. We were all rookies once.
stash,sharing,community,loner
Setting up an emergency cache near the water treatment plant. Open to all loners in need.
Noble idea, but what stops bandits from raiding it?
Hidden it good. False wall in the maintenance tunnel. Need to know where to look.
I'll contribute some bandages and rad pills.
Same. Community stashes saved my ass more than once.
This is what separates us from bandits. We build each other up.
mutant,hunting,teamwork,loner
Pack of blind dogs moving through the industrial sector. Too many for one stalker.
How many we talking?
Fifteen, maybe twenty. They're hunting in coordinated groups now.
I've got a PKM and 200 rounds. We set up a killbox?
Perfect. I'll drive them toward the bottleneck with grenades.
Count me in. Dog meat sells well to the rookies.
Meet at dawn. Clean shots, quick work, split the profits.
duty,pressure,resistance,loner
Duty's getting pushier with their recruitment. Cornered me twice this week.
They're desperate. Lost too many to Monolith recently.
Not my problem. I didn't come to the Zone to play soldier.
Tell them you've got radiation sickness. Works every time.
Or just avoid their sectors entirely. Plenty of Zone to explore.
True. Let them have their war. We've got artifacts to find.
information,network,cooperation,loner
Starting a daily info exchange on channel 141.5 at 2100. Safe routes, threats, opportunities.
About time we organized our intel. The factions do it, why not us?
Keep it coded though. Don't want bandits listening in.
Already worked out a system. Locations as playing cards, threats as chess pieces.
Smart. Information wins more fights than bullets.
First broadcast tonight. Spread the word to trusted stalkers only.
anomaly,science,discovery,loner
That new anomaly type near the cooling towers? It's not in any field guide.
Describe it. Always good to know what might kill us next.
Invisible until you're close, then your gear starts sparking. Electronics just die.
EMP anomaly? Shit, there goes detector reliability.
Threw bolts, they turned to dust mid-air. Never seen anything like it.
Mark it on the map. We'll need new tactics for this one.
freedom,politics,neutrality,loner
Freedom's offering "protection contracts" now. They're turning into Duty with better weed.
Every faction becomes what it hates eventually. The Zone's cruel joke.
They wanted me to pay for passage through "their" territory.
Since when do they own any part of the Zone?
Since they got enough guns to enforce it, apparently.
This is why we stay independent. No ideology, no bullshit.
survival,tips,experience,loner
Pro tip: always carry two detectors. When one fails, you'll thank me.
Expensive advice. Most of us can barely afford one.
Cheap detector's better than no detector. Even the old Soviet models work.
Truth. My Bear detector saved me more times than any fancy gear.
It's not the tools, it's knowing how to use them.
And knowing when to run. Most important skill in the Zone.
sidorovich,deals,negotiation,loner
Managed to haggle Sidorovich down to 80% markup. Feeling like I won the lottery.
How'd you manage that miracle?
Brought him pre-war vodka. His one weakness.
Noted. Where'd you find pre-war bottles?
Old bunker near Agroprom. Whole cellar untouched.
Sharing that intel deserves a drink. I'm buying at 100 Rads.
emission,shelter,emergency,loner
Emission sirens just went off. Anyone near the chemical plant?
Shit, I'm five minutes out. Where's the nearest shelter?
Underground parking garage, north side. Door's jammed but there's a window.
Running now. Sky's already turning.
Move your ass! You've got maybe three minutes.
Made it. Thanks brothers. Close one.
bandits,tactics,defense,loner
New bandit tactic - they're using rookies as bait. Fake injury scams.
Bastards have no bottom to their depravity.
Saw it yesterday. "Wounded" guy begging for help, six bandits in the bushes.
How do we counter this without abandoning real wounded?
Challenge questions. Real stalkers know the lingo, bandits don't.
And always approach from cover. Make them show themselves first.
artifact,research,theory,loner
Been tracking artifact spawns for months. There's definitely a pattern to it.
You and your theories. The Zone's random, accept it.
No, listen. High-value artifacts appear 72 hours after emissions, always.
Even if true, everyone would be hunting then.
That's the trick - they spawn in areas that were lethal during the emission.
Risky knowledge. But might be worth testing.
health,radiation,treatment,loner
My radiation levels won't drop. Three days of anti-rad and still clicking.
You check your gear? Sometimes artifacts leak without visible damage.
Shit, didn't think of that. Been carrying a Moonlight for weeks.
There's your problem. Those things are radiation fountains if cracked.
Expensive lesson. Doc's gonna charge me a fortune.
Better than growing a third arm. Get it checked now.
military,checkpoint,intel,loner
Military's rotating their checkpoint staff. New squad doesn't know the usual arrangements.
Meaning our bribes won't work?
Not yet. Give it a week, they all get hungry for extra income eventually.
Until then, back to the tunnels and forest paths.
Actually saw their sergeant eyeing my artifact detector. Might be corruptible.
Good intel. Greed makes everyone predictable.
zone,mystery,phenomenon,loner
Anyone else see those lights over the cooling towers last night? Wasn't an emission.
Green spirals? Yeah, made my detector go haywire.
The Zone's getting weirder. Like it's building up to something.
Or we're just noticing patterns that were always there.
Either way, I'm stocking up on supplies. Something feels off.
Trust your instincts. They've kept us alive this long.
trading,economy,inflation,loner
Ammo prices through the roof. 5.45 costs more than food now.
Supply lines are fucked. Military's intercepting shipments.
Time to get creative. Crossbows and knives don't need resupply.
Fine against mutants, but what about bandits with guns?
Ambush tactics. Our ancestors managed without automatic weapons.
The Zone's forcing us to evolve. Adapt or die.
cooperation,planning,future,loner
Been thinking about setting up a proper loner safehouse. Neutral ground for all free stalkers.
Tried before. Always falls apart - no leadership, no rules.
Maybe that's the point. Rotating volunteers, minimal structure.
Could work. A place to rest without faction bullshit.
I know an abandoned fire station. Solid walls, good sight lines.
Let's scout it tomorrow. Worth a shot.
bandit,conflict,victory,loner
Those bandits holding the bridge? They're gone. Permanent-like.
About time someone dealt with them. How many stalkers helped?
Just four of us. Hit them at dawn while they were hung over.
Clean work. That bridge is a major route.
Already seeing more traders using it. Good for everyone's business.
This is how we win. One small victory at a time.
mutant,evolution,adaptation,loner
Controllers are learning. Saw one using bloodsuckers as bodyguards.
Fuck me. As if they weren't dangerous enough alone.
Coordinated attacks too. Controller stunned me while suckers flanked.
How'd you survive that nightmare?
Psy-block and luck. Mostly luck.
We need new tactics. The old ways aren't cutting it.
resources,scarcity,planning,loner
Water sources are getting contaminated faster. Even the filtered stuff tastes like metal.
Noticed that too. My purification tablets barely help.
There's a clean spring near the old monastery. Tested it myself.
How long before everyone knows and it's guarded by bandits?
Already set up a cache system. Take what you need, leave what you can.
Smart. Cooperation without organization.
technology,discovery,sharing,loner
Found a working military radio in that crashed truck. Picks up their encrypted channels.
Encrypted means useless to us.
Not entirely. Can track movement patterns by signal strength.
That's actually clever. Know when areas are clear.
Exactly. Been mapping their patrol schedules all week.
Share that data. We all benefit from avoiding patrols.
camp,stories,community,loner
Setting up a campfire gathering tonight at the old barn. Stories, trades, and vodka.
Been too long since we had a proper gathering. I'll bring my guitar.
Someone should tell that story about the stalker who tamed a pseudodog.
That was Petro. Still swears it's true after six vodkas.
True or not, it's good for morale. We need more nights like this.
Agreed. The Zone's dark enough without losing our humanity.
duty,freedom,balance,loner
Duty and Freedom are at each other's throats again. The warehouse district is a war zone.
Good. While they fight, we loot the battlefield later.
Cynical but practical. Found two intact exoskeletons last skirmish.
Just watch for wounded. Both sides shoot grave robbers.
Let them exhaust themselves. Loners thrive in chaos.
The Zone's real lesson - all ideologies die, but stalkers endure.
exploration,discovery,wonder,loner
Found something beautiful today. A valley where anomalies create light patterns at sunset.
The Zone showing its other face?
Like nothing I've seen. Almost made me forget the danger for a moment.
Careful. The Zone's beauty is often its deadliest trap.
I know. But sometimes we need to remember why we stay.
True. It's not just survival - it's witnessing the impossible.
medical,emergency,help,loner
Doc's gone missing. Anyone seen him? Running low on anti-rad and getting worried.
Last spotted heading toward the anomalous grove. Three days ago.
Shit. That place is a maze of gravitational distortions.
We need to organize a search. Doc's saved too many of us.
I'll check his usual artifact spots. He mentioned needing specific samples.
Count me in. Can't afford to lose our only decent medic.
weather,anomaly,correlation,loner
Fog's rolling in thick. Last time it was like this, three stalkers vanished near the factory.
Fog hides more than vision. Anomalies shift in this weather.
My grandfather talked about fog like this before the first emission.
Superstition or pattern? Hard to tell in the Zone.
When in doubt, hunker down. Better paranoid than dead.
Amen to that. The Zone rewards caution.
bandit,tactics,countermeasures,loner
Bandits are getting smarter. Using jammers to block our emergency frequencies.
Noticed that. Called for backup yesterday, nothing but static.
We need preset rally points. Can't rely on radios anymore.
Old school solutions for new problems. I like it.
Three shots means danger, five means all clear?
Simple and effective. Spread the word.
trade,barter,economy,loner
Anyone need detector batteries? Got a surplus, looking for 7.62 rounds.
What's your ratio?
One battery pack for 30 rounds. Fair market value.
I can do 25 rounds, but I'll throw in some bandages.
Deal. Meet at the neutral cache by the water tower?
Tomorrow at noon. Good trading with you.
philosophy,purpose,reflection,loner
Some nights I wonder why we stay. Zone's taken more than it's given.
Because out there is worse. At least here, we're free.
Free to die horrible deaths, you mean.
Free to choose our deaths. That's more than most get.
Plus, where else would we go? The Zone changes you.
True. We're not fit for the outside world anymore.
military,observation,caution,loner
Military's been flying drones over the industrial sector. Stay out of open areas.
They mapping our routes or hunting someone specific?
Both, probably. Saw them mark several stash locations.
Time to relocate our supplies. Can't trust any spot they've seen.
Already moved mine underground. Concrete blocks their sensors.
Smart. We adapt faster than they can plan.
celebration,success,morale,loner
Alexei found a Goldfish artifact! First big score in weeks. Drinks are on him tonight.
About time someone had luck. This place has been stingy lately.
He's already talking about going home. One artifact retirement plan.
He'll be back. They always come back.
Let him dream. We all need hope to keep going.
True. Tonight we celebrate. Tomorrow, back to survival.
warning,danger,chemicals,loner
Avoid the chemical plant's east wing. Something's leaking - killed a pack of dogs instantly.
What kind of leak drops dogs that fast?
Greenish cloud, no smell. My detector didn't even register it.
New hazard type. Great, as if we needed more ways to die.
I'm marking it on the shared map. Wide berth recommended.
Good looking out. Information saves lives.
cooperation,rescue,success,loner

Is he alright? We need him functional.
Dehydrated and confused, but alive. Already asking about his medical supplies.

He earned it. Patched us up free more times than I can count.
This is why we stick together. No one else would have searched.
anomaly,theory,discussion,loner

Lay off the philosophy. Anomalies are just physics gone wrong.
Then why do they seem to respond to human presence? Getting more active lately.
Confirmation bias. You notice danger more when you're looking for it.
Maybe. But I'm doubling my caution anyway.
Smart. Wrong for the right reasons is still alive.
supplies,shortage,adaptation,loner
Filters are getting scarce. Mine's so clogged I can barely breathe through it.
Try the old metro trick - coffee filters as temporary layers.
Does that actually work?
Better than nothing. Saved my lungs during the ash storms last year.
Zone keeps teaching us to improvise. Adaptation is survival.
Truth. The prepared stalker is a living stalker.
night,sounds,investigation,loner
Anyone else hear those sounds from the north last night? Like metal tearing.
Heard it. Made my teeth ache from two kilometers away.
Think it's related to those lights we saw last week?
Everything's connected in the Zone. Question is how.

Wise choice. Curiosity killed more stalkers than bullets.
faction,observation,politics,loner
Monolith's been quiet lately. Too quiet. Anyone know what they're up to?
When fanatics go silent, they're planning something big.
Saw some heading deeper into the center. More than usual.
Maybe they're all going to pray themselves to death.
If only we were that lucky. Stay sharp near their territories.
Always do. Zealots are unpredictable.
memory,fallen,respect,loner
Today marks a year since Big Ivan walked into that anomaly field to save those rookies.
Still can't believe he's gone. Man was indestructible.
He saved three lives that day. They're all veteran stalkers now.
That's his real legacy. Knowledge and courage passed on.
Raising a vodka to him tonight. The Zone remembers its own.
To Ivan. May we all face our end with such purpose.
future,hope,determination,loner
Despite everything - the danger, the losses - I'm staying. This is home now.
The Zone gets in your blood. Can't explain it to outsiders.
We're the freest people on Earth. No governments, no rules but survival.

Here's to the loners - may we outlast every faction and empire.
The Zone provides, and we endure. Always have, always will.
rookie,overconfidence,lesson,loner
New guy here! Just bagged my first artifact. This Zone thing is easy money!

paranoid,conspiracy,discussion,loner

Everything changes! Don't you see? The artifacts, the mutations - all by design!
Kostya, when did you last sleep? You're starting to sound like Monolith.

Alright, I'm out. Good luck with your theories.
humor,coping,morale,loner
So a bloodsucker walks into a bar. Bartender says "Why the long face?"
Cyka...your jokes are worse than radiation poisoning.
tech,hacking,innovation,loner

For the right price. This brain's my only valuable asset.
philosophical,existence,deep,loner

Every damn night, brother. Every damn night.
bitter,exfaction,resentment,loner

superstitious,ritual,belief,loner

pragmatic,cold,survival,loner

helper,compassion,community,loner

unstable,breakdown,concern,loner

Someone get Doc. Viktor's losing it again.
drunk,rambling,humor,loner

NO!
*incomprehensible screeching noises*

poetic,romantic,zone,loner

businesslike,efficient,trade,loner

Always. Efficient trade, stalker.
religious,prayer,faith,loner

scientific,analysis,theory,loner

aggressive,confrontational,anger,loner

depressed,giving_up,support,loner

Come by my camp. Got extra vodka and someone should help drink it.
Alright. Thanks, stalker.
cheerful,optimistic,annoying,loner

mysterious,cryptic,unsettling,loner

Stay away from me, creep.
mentor,teaching,wisdom,loner

Second best friend. Can't shoot what you can't see, and anomalies are invisible death.

Experience and observation. Watch the air shimmer, feel the temperature change.

Any other wisdom?
Yeah - if an old stalker gives you advice, shut up and listen. We're old for a reason.
Thank you. We'll remember this.
lazy,unmotivated,complaints,loner

territorial,protective,warning,loner

Try me and find out. I've buried better stalkers than you.
Easy, we'll hunt elsewhere. No need for loner blood.
Smart choice. Respect territories and we all profit.
storyteller,exaggeration,entertainment,loner

Fifty? Last time it was twenty.
Did I say fifty? I meant a hundred! And they were all alphas!
Sure, and then the Wish Granter appeared and gave you a medal.
You laugh, but who's buying drinks tonight? This legend, that's who!

coward,fear,admission,loner

mercenary_past,professional,detached,loner

Suspicious cargo in Red Forest? Pass.

Keep your secrets. I prefer honest artifact hunting.
addict,desperation,pity,loner

Please... just one hit. I'll pay double next time.

young,eager,questions,loner

...Fine. But you carry the heavy stuff and don't ask stupid questions.
Yes! Thank you! I won't let you down!

mute,actions,understanding,loner
*taps chest twice, points north, makes slashing motion across throat*
Danger north? Bandits or mutants?
*holds up two fingers, makes gun shape*

*nods, gives thumbs up, disappears into shadows*
trader,negotiation,shrewd,loner

Nothing! Premium quality! Slight radiation... minimal really...

Fine! 5k and I'll throw in some rad pills!
fatalist,accepting,calm,loner

angry,theft,rage,loner

cynical,dark_humor,loner

bandit,encounter,violence,loner

Good. Fuck bandits. World's better without them.

frustrated,equipment,cursing,loner

veteran,tired,crude,loner

military,complaint,corruption,loner

drunk,belligerent,chaos,loner

pessimistic,bitter,reality,loner

Too stupid to quit, too stubborn to die. Fuck my life.
humor,sarcasm,bandits,loner

warning,danger,swearing,loner

near_death,relief,swearing,loner

bandit,revenge,satisfaction,loner

emission,panic,advice,loner
%speaker_first_name%, emission coming! Sky's turning that sick fucking green!
Shit! Where's the nearest shelter?
Basement two blocks north! Move your ass NOW!
Fuck fuck fuck! Running!
disgusted,mutants,description,loner
Just saw the most fucked up mutant. Like a dog had hate-sex with a spider and the baby got cancer.
What the actual fuck?
Eight legs, dog head, tumors everywhere. Smelled like rotting ass.
Did you kill it?
Fuck no! I ran like a bitch. Some things aren't worth the ammo.
Smart move. The Zone's cooking up new nightmares daily.
angry,betrayal,threats,loner
If I find out which one of you fucks told the bandits about my stash, you're dead!
Wasn't me. I don't talk to bandits.
Someone did! They knew exactly where to look!
Maybe you got followed. Not everything's betrayal.
Bullshit! I'm finding the rat and feeding him to the dogs!
Calm down before you shoot the wrong person.
Fuck calm! Someone's gonna pay!
sick,radiation,help,loner
I'm fucked. Radiation sickness bad. Puking blood and shit.
How many rads you take?
Detector maxed out. Was in that hot zone too long chasing artifacts.
You need Doc immediately. Like yesterday.
Can't make it. Too weak. This might be it.
Where are you? Someone will come.
Old gas station. Hurry. Everything tastes like metal.
Hold on. Help's coming.
crazy,unhinged,warnings,loner
THE ZONE SPEAKS! Can't you hear it screaming? IT KNOWS OUR SINS!
Shit, another one lost it.
I'M NOT CRAZY! THE ANOMALIES SPELL WORDS! DEATH WORDS!
Someone get this lunatic before he hurts someone.
YOU'LL SEE! WHEN THE ZONE JUDGES US ALL! YOU'LL SEE!
mercenary,job,suspicious,loner
Got a job offer. 100k to escort some "researchers" to Lab X-18. Smells like bullshit.
Researchers don't pay that much unless they're not researchers.
That's what I'm thinking. Probably fucking spies or worse.
Money's good though. Tempting.
Until they shoot you in the back once you're not useful.
Fair point. Fuck it, I'll pass.
humor,accident,embarrassment,loner
So I threw a grenade at some dogs... bounced back and blew up my own fucking stash!
HAHAHA! You dumb fuck!
It's not funny! That was everything I owned!
It's a little funny.
Okay maybe a little. But still, fuck my life.
Zone's way of teaching grenade safety.
Expensive fucking lesson.
duty,encounter,mockery,loner
Duty tried recruiting me again. Told them to suck my anomalous dick.
How'd they take that?
Not well. Started their "save humanity" speech.
Humanity can save itself. I'm here for money.
Exactly what I told them! They called me selfish.
Better selfish than brainwashed.
Fucking A right.
bloodsucker,terror,survival,loner
%speaker_first_name%, that bloodsucker's still hunting near the factory. Almost got me twice today.
The big one with the scar?
That's the fucker! Smart too. Sets ambushes.
We need to organize a hunt. That thing's killed three stalkers.
I'm in. But we need at least five guys and fire weapons.
I've got molotovs. Hate those invisible shits.
Tomorrow at dawn then. Let's end this bastard.
About fucking time. I want its head on a spike.
You'll have to get in line for that honor.
freedom,weed,trade,loner
Freedom's selling that good shit again. Anyone want to split a purchase?
Fuck that. Need my reflexes sharp, not dulled.
Your loss. Helps with the nightmares.
So does vodka, and it's cheaper.
Can't shoot straight drunk. Can while high.
That explains your shit aim.
wounded,help,urgent,loner
Gut shot. Bleeding bad. Anyone near the water tower?
Five minutes out. Hold pressure on it!
Trying. Hands slippery. Fuck this hurts.
Almost there. Stay awake!
artifact,celebration,luck,loner
HOLY SHIT! CRYSTAL ARTIFACT! I'M FUCKING RICH!
Shut the fuck up! You want every bandit in 5km to hear?
Sorry, sorry. Just... holy shit. Never seen one in person.
Get to a trader fast. Don't trust anyone.
Not even you guys?
ESPECIALLY not us. That's retirement money.
Fair enough. Radio silence from here.
monolith,warning,combat,loner
Monolith squad moving through the vehicle graveyard. Full combat gear.
Those zealot fucks heading north or south?
South toward the rookie village. This is bad.
Shit! How many?
Eight, maybe nine. Exoskeletons and Gausses.
Rookies won't stand a chance. We have to warn them.
Already running there. Bring everyone you can!
Those cultist bastards picked the wrong village. On my way.
scammer,warning,anger,loner
Watch out for a stalker with a wolf patch. Fucker's selling fake artifacts.
Wolf patch? Shit, almost bought from him yesterday.
Lucky escape. His "Moonlight" was just a glowing rock.
We should teach him a lesson.
Already did. He's missing some teeth now.
mutant,cooking,survival,loner
Anyone know if boar meat's safe? Killed one that looked... mostly normal.
Check for tumors. No tumors, probably okay.
Define "probably"
You might shit yourself. You might not. Zone roulette.
Fuck it. I'm hungry enough to risk it.
Cook it well. Really well. Like charcoal well.
Roger that. If I die, avenge my intestines.
We'll put "Died of Questionable Boar" on your cross.
Perfect epitaph.
weather,storm,shelter,loner
%speaker_first_name%, massive storm rolling in. Like nothing I've seen before.
Define massive. We talking rain or Zone fuckery?
Lightning's hitting upward. So... Zone fuckery.
Fuck me. Everyone underground NOW.
depression,suicide,intervention,loner
Can't do this anymore. The Zone wins. I'm done.
Hey, talk to us. What happened?
Lost my whole crew to a controller. Watched them turn on each other.
Fuck, that's rough. But you survived for a reason.
What reason? To suffer alone?
To tell their story. To help others avoid the same fate.
I... hadn't thought of that.
Come to the campfire tonight. Share their memory. You're not alone.
Maybe. Thanks, stalker.
That's what we're here for. The Zone takes enough without us helping it.
bandit,ambush,tactics,loner
Bandits setting up fake checkpoints now. Complete with stolen military gear.
Clever bastards. How do we tell the difference?
Real military's too lazy to check every stalker. Fakes are thorough.
So avoid the competent checkpoints. Got it.
Ironic as fuck but accurate.
discovery,laboratory,warning,loner
Found an unmarked lab entrance. Door's been blown open from inside.
From INSIDE? Fuck that noise.
Yeah. Claw marks everywhere. Big ones.
Mark it on the map with skull emojis.
Already did. Wrote "NOPE" in big letters.
Good man. Some mysteries should stay mysterious.
economics,inflation,complaint,loner
Vodka prices up 300%. What the fuck is happening to this economy?
Supply truck got hit. No shipments for weeks.
Time to learn moonshining. Can't be that hard.
Famous last words before going blind.
Better blind than sober in this shithole.
Can't argue with that logic.
I'll test it first. If I die, don't drink my stash.
rookie,mistake,lesson,loner
New guy just tried to pet a blind dog. Currently missing fingers.
Natural selection at work.
He said it looked friendly!
Nothing looks friendly in the Zone. First rule.
duty,mockery,humor,loner
Saw Duty marching in formation. In the swamp. Funniest shit ever.
Let me guess - anomaly field?
Yep. Lost half to a whirligig. Still kept marching.
Discipline over brains. Classic Duty.
Natural selection with extra steps.
trade,negotiation,artifacts,loner
Got three Sparklers and a Jellyfish. Looking for ammo and filters.
What caliber?
5.45 and 9x39. Running dual setup.
I've got 300 rounds of 5.45. Trade for two Sparklers?
Deal. Meet at the old bus stop?
In an hour. Come alone.
Always do. Trust but verify.
Smart policy. See you there.
psy,exposure,warning,loner
Stay away from the old school. Something's fucking with people's heads there.
Controller?
Worse. Makes you see shit that ain't there. Dead family, old friends.
Fuck. That's cruel even for the Zone.
Watched a stalker talk to thin air for hours. Then he walked into an anomaly smiling.
Note to self: avoid anything that makes you happy in the Zone.
military,bribe,opportunity,loner
%speaker_first_name%, that corrupt sergeant's back on duty. Taking bribes again.
Same rates?
Even better. He's desperate. 2000 rubles for passage.
What's his problem?
Gambling debts. Owes big to some bandits.
A corrupt soldier in debt to bandits. That's useful information.
Very useful. We could leverage this.
Or watch him get kneecapped. Both entertaining options.
Why not both? Use him then enjoy the show.
I like how you think.
massacre,horror,warning,loner
Jesus Christ. Found what's left of that merc squad. It's... fuck.
What happened?
Looks like they turned on each other. Bite marks, claw wounds. But they did it to themselves.
Controller?
Has to be. One guy ate his own fucking arm.
New level of fucked up. Where was this?
Apartment complex by the bridge. Whole building's a no-go now.
humor,close_call,relief,loner
Almost shit myself laughing. Bloodsucker jumped me while I was taking a piss.
How's that funny?
Sprayed it right in the face! Thing ran off gagging!
You pissed off a bloodsucker. Literally.
New defense tactic: tactical urination.
ecologist,cooperation,payment,loner
Eggheads paying 10k for live snork capture. Anyone insane enough?
Live? Those jumping fucks? Pass.
They provide tranq rounds and a cage.
Still pass. 10k isn't worth the therapy.
zone,mystery,investigation,loner
The old power plant's humming again. Hasn't done that in years.
Humming how?
Like it's warming up. Lights flickering in patterns.
Probably just another Zone anomaly.
Maybe. But the patterns look deliberate. Like morse code.
Great. Now the Zone's trying to communicate.
What if it always was? What if we just weren't listening?
Too deep for me. I just shoot things and collect artifacts.
bandit,raid,defense,loner
Bandits planning to hit the trader camp tonight. Overheard them at the bar.
How many?
Dozen, maybe more. They think we're soft.
Time to prove them wrong. I'll spread the word.
Set up killzones. Make them regret breathing.
Already on it. Tonight we remind them why free stalkers survived this long.
artifact,science,theory,loner
Think artifacts are alive? Mine keeps warm even in the freezer.
Don't overthink Zone shit. Way lies madness.
emergency,medical,help,loner
Doc's down! Controller got him! Need someone with medical training NOW!
Shit! I know basic field medicine. Where?
Old clinic. He's conscious but not... right.
On my way. Keep him talking, don't let him sleep.
He keeps saying the numbers. Over and over.
What numbers?
I don't know! Just hurry!
freedom,conflict,observation,loner
Freedom and Duty going at it hard near the warehouses. Explosions everywhere.
Good distraction. Hit the military depot while they're busy?
My thoughts exactly. Guards probably watching the fireworks.
Meet in 20. Bring bolt cutters.
And extra bags. Christmas comes early.
paranormal,sighting,fear,loner
Saw something impossible last night. A stalker walking through walls.
How much did you drink?
Stone sober. He looked at me, smiled, then stepped through solid concrete.
Ghost? Hallucination? New mutant?
Wearing our gear. Had a sunrise suit and everything.
That's... deeply unsettling.
Zone's testing new ways to fuck with us.
Or old stalkers found a way to beat the system.
Either way, I'm not sleeping tonight.
humor,drugs,mistake,loner
Accidentally took rad pills instead of psy-block. Now I'm seeing sounds and hearing colors.
That's not how rad pills work, idiot.
Then what the fuck did I take?
Check the bottle?
Can't read. Letters keep dancing.
You took Freedom's "special vitamins" didn't you?
...Fuck.
sidorovich,scheme,profit,loner
Got intel on Sid's supply routes. Fat bastard's vulnerable Thursdays.
Not hitting Sidorovich. Bad for everyone long term.
Not hit - negotiate. Force better prices.
Interesting. Leverage instead of violence.
Exactly. We protect his shipment, he cuts prices 30%.
Or we let bandits know when he's exposed.
Now you're thinking like a businessman.
In the Zone, everyone's got a price. Even Sid.
celebration,success,party,loner
WE DID IT! Cleared out the bandit nest! Drinks on me tonight!
About fucking time! How many did we get?
All fifteen! Plus their leader!
The one with the stupid mohawk?
That's him! Not so tough without his gang!
Free passage through the valley again. Worth celebrating!
100 Rads tonight! First round's on the heroes!
Second round's on their looted corpses!
I love happy endings. Especially dead bandit endings.
mutant,evolution,concern,loner
Bloodsuckers are hunting in packs now. Since when do they cooperate?
Since the Zone decided we weren't scared enough.
Seriously. Saw five working together. Coordinated ambush.
New tactics needed. Fire still work?
Yeah, but they're learning to avoid it.
Learning? Fuck me, they're getting smarter.
Everything in the Zone evolves. Except our paychecks.
tragedy,memorial,respect,loner
Lost three good stalkers today. Emission caught them in the open.
Shit. Anyone we knew?
Yeah. The twins and old Gregoriy.
Fuck... Gregoriy taught me everything.
Gathering at the fire pit tonight. Bring vodka and stories.
They deserve a proper send-off.
The Zone claims its due. But we remember our own.
Always. See you tonight, stalkers.
philosophy,meaning,life,loner
What the fuck are we even doing here? Hunting for glowing rocks while the world outside forgets we exist?
We're living. Really living. Out there, they're just waiting to die in their boring fucking jobs.
We're waiting to die too, just faster and with more radiation.
Yeah, but every sunrise here feels earned. That's more than most can say.
equipment,diy,repair,loner
My fucking gas mask filter is shot. Anyone know a workaround?
Charcoal from the campfire and a dirty sock. Not great, but better than inhaling Zone fumes.
You're shitting me, right?
Do I sound like I'm shitting you? It's that or you find a trader. Desperate times, stalker.
traitor,betrayal,revenge,loner
That piece of shit 'Viper' sold out another loner to the military. Got him captured for a few thousand rubles.
Someone needs to put a bullet in that rat fucker.
He's smart. Hides behind faction checkpoints.
The Zone's a small place. One day he'll slip up, and we'll be waiting.
He deserves worse than a bullet. Anomaly fields are slow.
sickness,radiation,fear,loner
Got a bad dose of rads. Skin's starting to peel. Fuck.
Get to the ecologists' bunker. They have experimental meds.
They'll take every last artifact I have.
Better than pissing blood and losing your hair. Your call, stalker.
...Fuck. On my way.
campfire,community,respite,loner
Quiet night for once. Anyone got a story?
I once saw a snork try to jump over a Whirligig. Funniest shit I ever saw.
Did it make it?
Parts of it did. Rained snork giblets for ten minutes.
Hah! Good one. Pass the vodka.
conspiracy,paranoid,warning,loner
The PDA network... it's not secure. Someone's listening. Deleting all my logs.
Who's listening? Bandits? Military?
Worse. The Zone itself. It learns from us.
You've been sniffing too much burner anomaly fumes, man.
Laugh now. But don't say I didn't warn you when it sends a mutant that knows your name.
food,scarcity,desperation,loner
I'm so hungry I'd eat Sidorovich's cooking. Almost.
That desperate, huh? I've got some boar meat. Tastes like shit but it's calories.
Trade you for it? Got some 9mm rounds.
Keep your fucking ammo. Just take the meat. We're loners, not bandits.
...Thanks, stalker. I won't forget this.
old_timer,wisdom,cynical,loner
Rookie asked me for the secret to survival. I told him "don't die."
Harsh but accurate. He learn anything?
Yeah, that I'm an asshole. But he's still alive, so maybe it sunk in.
mercenary,deal,mistrust,loner
Mercs are paying top ruble for guides to the center. Smells like a one-way trip.
It always is with those fucks. They pay you to find the anomalies, then use your corpse to map the safe path.
Some rookies are taking the offer. Poor bastards.
Can't save everyone from their own greed.
endurance,resolve,final_thoughts,loner
Another year in this place. Half my friends are ghosts. My gear's more patches than original.
But you're still here, brother.
Yeah. Still here. Guess that's something.
It's everything. Good hunting, stalker.
rookie_kill,trauma,first_time,loner
I... I killed a bandit today. First time. He was just a kid.
He had a gun, didn't he?
Yeah, but he hesitated. I didn't.
That's why you're breathing and he's not. Don't think about it. The Zone doesn't give points for mercy.
It doesn't feel right.
It never does. You just get used to it. Or you die. Welcome to the Zone.
anomaly,close_call,fear,loner
Fucking hell. A Vortex anomaly opened up right behind me. Sucked my backpack right off.
Better the pack than you. You hurt?
Nah, just scared shitless. Watched my entire haul of artifacts get crushed into a ball the size of my fist.
The Zone giveth, the Zone taketh away. Mostly taketh.
lucky_find,celebration,greed,loner
Found an old Duty captain's stash. Untouched! Exosuit parts and a pristine rifle!
Holy shit, where?
Like I'd tell you. Finders keepers, losers weepers.
Asshole. At least sell the parts fair.
Maybe. If the price is right. For now, I'm king of the fucking Zone!
freedom,party,annoyance,loner
Can't sleep. Freedom's blasting their shitty rock music again.
Someone should tell them mutants are attracted to loud noises.
I tried. They told me to "chill out, man" and offered me a joint.
Idiots. Let's hope a Chimera shows up to crash their party.
mutant_pet,insanity,weird,loner
That hermit near the swamps... swear I saw him feeding a pseudodog.
The one who calls it "Patches"? Yeah, he's been at it for months.
How is he not dead?
No idea. Maybe the dog thinks he's too weird to eat. The Zone has strange rules.
sidorovich,rumor,scam,loner
Heard Sidorovich is selling "Wish Granter maps". Ten thousand rubles a pop.
And some poor fucker is probably buying them.
A map to a fairy tale. That fat bastard has no shame.
He's selling hope. Most valuable commodity in the Zone. Can't even be mad at the hustle.
barter,negotiation,humor,loner
Alright, I'll trade you the artifact, but you throw in that sausage.
This sausage? This is my emotional support sausage.
Fuck your emotions, I'm hungry. The sausage, or no deal.
...Fine. But I get a bite first. For closure.
military_harassment,frustration,anger,loner
Military patrol shook me down again. "Routine inspection." Stripped me down to my underwear.
Find anything?
Nah, I hid my good shit. But it's the fucking principle of it. Power-tripping assholes.
One day one of them will push the wrong stalker too far.
I'm counting on it.
ghost_story,legend,fear,loner
Anyone ever hear the story of the Limansk ghost? The sniper who never runs out of ammo?
Yeah, campfire bullshit to scare rookies.
My buddy swore he saw him. Said the bullets pass right through walls.
Your buddy was probably drunk or getting shot at by Monolith. Still, gives me the creeps thinking about it.
hope,future,dream,loner
One more big score. That's all I need. Then I'm out. A little farm, maybe a dog.
The Stalker's dream. Heard it a thousand times.
This time it's real. I'm getting close.
Good luck, brother. I hope you make it. For all of us.
failed_heist,humor,shame,loner
Okay, don't laugh. I tried to raid that bandit depot.
How'd it go? You look like you wrestled a Chimera and lost.
Their 'guard dog' was a fucking pseudogiant. I climbed a tree and cried for an hour.
A pseudogiant as a guard dog... those bandits are crazier than I thought.
Lost my rifle, my backpack, and all my dignity. But hey, still got my life.
failed_heist,humor,shame,loner
Okay, don't laugh. I tried to raid that bandit depot.
How'd it go? You look like you wrestled a Chimera and lost.
Their 'guard dog' was a fucking pseudogiant. I climbed a tree and cried for an hour.
A pseudogiant as a guard dog... those bandits are crazier than I thought.
Lost my rifle, my backpack, and all my dignity. But hey, still got my life.
sidorovich,debt,threats,loner
Sidorovich has put a bounty on my head. A small one. More of an insult, really.
What for? Forgetting to say thank you for his garbage prices?
Told him his "Tourist's Delight" sausage tasted like recycled tires. He didn't appreciate the feedback.
That fat fuck can't handle the truth. Watch your back, some rookies might try to collect.
zombie,horde,warning,loner
Huge horde of zombified stalkers moving out of Yantar. At least fifty of them.
Damn. Heading where?
South, towards the Garbage. Just a slow, shambling wall of "get out of here."
Time to avoid that entire sector. Not worth the ammo to put them down.
Poor bastards. A grim reminder of what this place does to you if you're not careful.
artifact_rumor,hoax,trap,loner
Anyone hear about the "Oasis" artifact? Supposedly heals all wounds.
That's a trap. A well-known bandit lure. They spread the rumor, then ambush anyone who goes looking.
Fucking hell. Almost fell for it.
If it sounds too good to be true in the Zone, it's either a trap or an anomaly that will kill you in a new, exciting way.
mental_fatigue,burnout,loner
The silence is the worst part. The quiet moments between the gunfire and the screaming.
That's when you start thinking. Never a good idea in this place.
I can't even remember what my life was like before this. Just... the Zone.
We all get that way. Take a break. Go to the 100 Rads, get drunk, forget for a night.
And wake up with a hangover and the same shitty reality?
Yes. But with one night's rest. It's the best we've got.
lost_friend,grief,memorial,loner
Found Yuri's PDA. He didn't make it out of the Red Forest.
Shit. Yuri was a good man. Always shared his vodka.
Last log entry was just... static. And a controller's laugh.
Fuck. Let's add his name to the memorial board at the bar.
He deserves to be remembered. I'll buy a round in his name tonight.
duty_vs_freedom,stupidity,loner
Just watched a Duty patrol and a Freedom squad argue over who got to 'liberate' a stash of old tires.
Please tell me they started shooting.
They did. For ten minutes. Over a pile of fucking rubber.
And we're supposed to pick a side? I'd rather side with the mutants. They're more logical.
mutant_behavior,observation,strange,loner
The rats in the Garbage have started... building things. Little nests out of scrap metal.
Are you drunk? They're rats.
Sober as a judge. They're organized. Saw them work together to move a piece of rebar.
The Zone's leaking into everything. Even the vermin are getting smarter. That's unsettling as hell.
technical_issue,gear_failure,frustration,loner
My headlamp keeps flickering. Anyone know how to fix a short in these cheap-ass models?
Smack it. Hard.
That's your fix for everything.
It works 60% of the time. If that fails, check the contact point for corrosion. Scrape it with your knife.
...Smacking it worked. I hate that you were right.
ecologist_deal,risky,job,loner
The eggheads are offering crazy money for anyone willing to plant a scanner inside the Brain Scorcher.
That's not a job, that's a suicide note with a paycheck attached.
They say they have a new prototype psy-block that "should" work.
"Should" is the deadliest word in the Zone.
But the money could set you up for life. Or what's left of it.
I'll stick to hunting glowing rocks, thanks. I like my brain unscrambled.
false_hope,disappointment,reality,loner
Thought I found a way out. A hole in the perimeter fence, no guards.
And?
Led straight into a minefield. The military bastards are getting creative.
There is no easy way out. The only way is through the main checkpoints, and that costs a fortune.
Looks like I'm stuck here. Again.
We're all stuck here. Pass the vodka.
theft,accusation,dispute,loner
My rifle's gone. I left it by the fire for five minutes.
Who else is at this camp?
Just us and that quiet rookie who joined last night.
The 'quiet' ones are always trouble. Check his pack.
I'll do more than check his pack if I find it. I'll make him eat the barrel.
nightmares,trauma,psychological,loner
Woke up screaming again. Dreamt a bloodsucker was wearing my dead wife's face.
Fuck, man. That's... dark.
The Zone finds what you love and twists it into a weapon against you.
It's why you gotta be empty inside to survive here long term. Nothing to use against you.
Some days I think I'm already there.
scavenging,lucky_find,reward,loner
Looted a military convoy that hit an anomaly. Found a crate of grenades and a working night vision scope!
You lucky son of a bitch. Selling any of it?
Keeping the scope. But I'll trade grenades for decent food. Tired of eating mutant meat.
I've got canned beef and vodka. How many grenades will that get me?
Two cans and a bottle gets you three grenades. My camp, dusk.
boredom,complaint,nothing_happening,loner
Another boring fucking day. No artifacts, no jobs, not even a bandit to shoot.
Don't jinx it. A boring day is a day you don't die.
I'm so bored I'm considering joining Freedom just for the weed.
Careful. That's how they get you.
animal_companion,friendship,strange,loner
The weirdest thing happened. A blind dog followed me back to camp. It doesn't attack, just... sits there.
Probably has rabies. Or worse, Zone-rabies.
I threw it some food and it ate it. Now it won't leave. I think... I think I have a pet?
You've officially gone insane. Congratulations.
Yeah, maybe. But I'm not gonna lie, it's nice to have company that doesn't talk back.
weapon_jam,combat_failure,panic,loner
My fucking AK jammed in the middle of a firefight! Had to beat a bandit to death with it!
That's what you get for not cleaning your rifle.
I cleaned it this morning! The dust in this shithole is like sandpaper!
Well, at least it still works as a club. Good to know.
return_to_zone,addiction,explanation,loner
I actually made it out. Had a flat, a warm bed, normal food. Lasted three months.
And you came back? Why in the hell?
It was too quiet. Too boring. Nobody understood. I missed the sound of my detector.
The Zone's a sickness. Once you're in, you can never truly leave.
supernatural,ghost,warning,loner
The ghost whispers are back. Near the Agroprom underground. Telling me to jump.
That's not a ghost, it's a psi-field. Stay away from there without a helmet.
Felt real. Sounded like my old squad leader.
That's how it gets you. Uses your memories against you. Get out of there, now.
faction_war,collateral_damage,loner
My stash got blown up in a firefight between Duty and Freedom. Two weeks of work, gone.
Never stash your gear in a warzone. Rookie mistake.
It wasn't a warzone when I put it there! Those fuckers bring their squabbles everywhere.
The Zone's their playground. We just try to survive in it.
sickness,food_poisoning,complaint,loner
Don't eat the canned meat from the trader in the swamps. I've been shitting my guts out for a day.
The one with the eye patch? His stuff always smelled weird.
Weird is an understatement. I think the "meat" was just boiled mutant flesh.
Someone should go have a 'talk' with him.
I will. As soon as I can stand up without shitting myself again.
barter,disagreement,valuable,loner
You want my night vision scope for a handful of artifacts? Are you insane?
It's a good offer! Three Flash artifacts and a Moonlight!
I can't see in the dark with artifacts. This scope has kept me alive. Price is non-negotiable.
Fine, fine. Greedy bastard.
It's not greed, it's survival. Learn the difference.
mission_failed,regret,loss,loner
The escort job went to shit. Client's dead. Mutants got him.
Did you at least get paid?
Half upfront. Not worth it. Watched a man get torn apart.
It happens. Can't save everyone.
I know. But this one... this one's gonna stick with me.
small_victory,celebration,morale,loner
Fixed my rifle! Just needed a bit of wire and a lot of swearing.
The Zone equivalent of winning the lottery.
Feels like it. Time to celebrate with my last can of warm beer.
Enjoy it. Tomorrow it'll probably jam again.
Let me have this one moment, you cynical fuck.
map_update,danger_zone,warning,loner
Updating the community map: the path through the vehicle cemetery is a no-go. Full of burner anomalies now.
Since when? I went through there yesterday.
Since the emission this morning. The Zone shuffled the deck. Watched it claim a whole pack of dogs.
Fuck. Thanks for the heads-up. That was my main route.
Stay safe, stalker. The maps are only good for a day at best.
music,campfire,culture,loner
Brought my guitar to the campfire tonight. Any requests?
Play that one about the stalker who fell in love with a controller.
Tragic love story. You got it. But it'll cost you a bottle of vodka.
Deal. Music's worth more than booze in this place.
job_offer,suspicious,merc,loner
Some Merc in a fancy suit wants to hire a guide. Says the pay is "no object."
That's a red flag big enough to see from space.
He wants someone to lead him to a "spatial anomaly." Won't say why.
He's gonna try and push you in. It's a classic Merc move.
Thought so. Told him to find some other poor bastard to use as a human detector.
rookie_mistake,lesson,humor,loner
Just saw a rookie try to barter with a zombified stalker.
You're kidding.
Nope. "Hey man, wanna trade that rifle for some bread?" The zombie just moaned and shot him in the foot.
I almost feel bad for laughing.
Don't. The kid learned a valuable lesson about negotiation.
loneliness,isolation,human_contact,loner
Haven't spoken to another human in three weeks. Starting to talk to myself.
As long as you're not losing the arguments, you're fine.
It's not funny. I'm forgetting what normal conversation sounds like.
Come back to the Cordon. Have a drink. See other miserable faces. It helps.
Maybe I will. I'm tired of my own shitty company.
scam_artist,revenge,justice,loner
That asshole selling fake detector readings? We found him.
Good. What happened?
We "sold" him a map to a "huge artifact stash."
Let me guess. The stash was in a Chimera's den?
Worse. Middle of an anomaly cluster that was about to go active. Poetic justice.
The Zone provides its own kind of justice. Well done.
artifact_curse,superstition,fear,loner
Ever since I picked up this Soul artifact, my luck's been shit. Gear fails, mutants find me, food spoils.
You're just noticing the Zone's usual bullshit.
No, this is different. It feels... malicious. Like the artifact is cursed.
Ditch it, then. Throw it in an anomaly.
I can't. It's worth too much. But I'm starting to think it's not worth my life.
resupply,relief,community,loner
A supply helicopter crashed near the swamps! It's raining free food and ammo!
You serious? Not a trap?
Saw it with my own eyes! Military is trying to secure it, but loners are getting there first!
Christmas came early! On my way! Don't take all the good shit!
strange_sighting,mystery,unexplained,loner
I saw it again. The shimmering man. He was standing over a dead snork, then just faded away.
The ghost stalker? You're the third person to report that this month.
He didn't feel threatening. He felt... sad.
Maybe it's the Zone's memory of a dead stalker. Who knows. Just don't follow him.
medical_trade,barter,necessity,loner
Need blood plasma packs. Got a Mama's Beads for trade.
That's a heavy trade. Who's hurt?
Rookie got shot up by bandits. I'm not letting another kid bleed out.
I have two packs. Meet me at the Skadovsk. No charge.
You sure? This artifact is worth a fortune.
A life is worth more. Pay it forward someday. Now hurry.
philosophy,cynicism,truth,loner
Duty wants to save the world, Freedom wants to free the world. Monolith wants to serve a rock.
And what do we want?
To get rich and not die. It's the only honest philosophy in this entire fucking place.
Can't argue with that. Pass the sausage.
mutant_nest,clearing,teamwork,loner
That bloodsucker nest in the sewers? It's gone.
What? Who was crazy enough to go down there?
A squad of about ten loners. Went in with shotguns and flamethrowers. Only seven came out, but they did it.
Holy shit. We should buy those guys a drink.
They made the route to the Garbage safe for everyone. They earned more than a drink.
sidorovich,complaint,food,loner
I think the bread I bought from Sidorovich was just painted green styrofoam.
Did it squeak when you bit into it?
A little. I'm going back there to demand a refund.
Good luck. He has a 'no refunds, especially for idiots' policy.
leaving_zone,goodbye,farewell,loner
Well, that's it for me. Made my score. I'm leaving tomorrow.
For real this time?
For real. Got enough to buy a small house by the sea. Away from all this shit.
Good on you, stalker. You're one of the few who made it.
Drink one for me when you're watching the sunset.
I will. Good hunting to all of you. And stay alive.
regret,past_actions,reflection,loner
I used to be Duty. Believed all their bullshit.
What changed?
They ordered us to fire on a group of rookies for "violating quarantine." They were just lost. I couldn't do it.
So you deserted.
Yeah. Better a free man with no honor, than a "hero" who murders for orders..
You have honor in our eyes. Welcome to the loners, brother.
mission,patrol,dolg
Alpha Squad, report in. What's the status on the sweep through Sector 7?
Sector is clear. Twelve confirmed kills. No casualties. We’re moving to extraction.
Understood. Return to base. Debrief on arrival. Maintain formation until you're behind the wire.
discipline,order,dolg
Reminder: equipment check at 0800 sharp. No excuses. No delays.
Confirmed. My rifle's clean enough to eat off. Same as always.
That’s the standard. Keep it. The Zone doesn’t give second chances.
ideology,zone,dolg
The Zone is a threat to humanity. Every day we let it grow, more lives are at risk.
Agreed. We’re not here for glory or profit. We’re here to contain this madness.
Contain it, and eventually purge it. That’s the mission.
bandits,security,dolg
Spotted three bandits loitering near the checkpoint east of Rostok. No gear, just rifles.
They’re probably scouting. Bandits don't move unless they're desperate or planning something.
Orders?
Engage if they approach. If they back off, let them run. We don’t waste bullets on cowards unless we have to.
leadership,command,dolg
Colonel's been quiet lately. You think something's going on?
If he’s not talking, it means he’s working. You know how he operates.
Right. Calm before the storm, then.
Exactly. Keep your gear tight and your ears open.
orders,discipline,internal
Reminder to all Dolg units: Any unauthorized trades with stalkers will result in disciplinary action.
Understood. We serve the mission, not personal profit.
One of ours was caught selling ammo to a bandit in disguise. He’s being dealt with.
Good. The Zone tempts even strong men. Weak ones don’t belong in our ranks.
Keep your eyes open. The Zone corrupts more than just flesh.
freedom,conflict,border
Freedom patrol spotted near our checkpoint again. Loitering without cause.
Let them stare. They're looking for a reason to provoke us.
If they cross the line, we respond. No hesitation.
Orders are clear. Do not initiate, but if fired upon, end it quickly.
Freedom wants to make the Zone a playground. We’re here to build a wall around it.
freedom,threat,ideology,dolg
Freedom operatives were spotted near the Rostok checkpoint again. Same group as last week.
They were warned. If they keep testing our lines, we will treat them as hostiles.
Command believes they are scouting for new smuggling routes. Possibly trying to stir local support.
Let them preach their anarchist nonsense. Discipline is what keeps men alive out here, not ideology.
Their so-called freedom is just another word for chaos. No command structure, no rules, just a ticking bomb.
We lost two patrols last month to zones they claimed were safe. Their negligence is criminal.
Freedom talks about coexistence with the Zone. There is no coexistence with death and radiation.
Every time they sabotage our containment efforts, more civilians die outside the perimeter.
This isn't politics. It's security. Freedom is a threat to everything we're trying to hold together.
Orders stand. If they cross our line again, we respond with force. The Zone does not forgive mistakes, and neither do we.
discipline,rogue,containment,dolg
We've detained a rogue stalker near Garbage. Claimed he was "just passing through."
Passing through restricted territory with suppressed weapons and forged papers?
