Exactly. We suspect he's ex-Freedom or a black market courier.
Interrogate him thoroughly. If he’s clean, send him back limping. If he’s not, bury him quietly.
Understood. We’ll extract whatever intel he has. No loose ends.
Also, remind Delta squad their patrol logs are overdue. Protocol applies to everyone.
Already on it. I’ll have their squad lead write it up manually if I have to.
Good. We don't let disorder fester — not outside, and definitely not within.
freedom,engagement,dolg,conflict
Recon drone spotted a Freedom patrol near the border of Rostok. They're probing again.
They're testing our perimeter. Looking for weak spots like rats chewing at wire.
Orders?
Shadow them. No contact unless fired upon. I want to know where they sleep and who they meet.
Copy that. If they so much as sneeze in our direction, they’ll regret walking upright.
This isn't about pride. It's containment. Freedom spreads chaos under the guise of liberty.
Letting the Zone run wild is suicide. We've seen what happens when there's no order.
They pretend to be idealists. In reality, they're drugged-up looters with a flag.
One day command will greenlight a purge. When that day comes, we finish the job.
Until then, we hold the line. No ground given. No compromises.
anomaly,threat,dolg,patrol
Patrol Bravo, report your findings near the collapsed train tunnel.
We've located a dense anomaly cluster. Thermal, electrical, and gravitational signatures. Unstable and expanding.
Any Stalker presence nearby?
Negative. Area seems abandoned. One burnt body stuck mid-air, likely got too curious.
Mark the perimeter with warning signs. Secure a fallback route. Command may want samples taken later.
Understood. Requesting a science team to handle the core readings. It's beyond safe levels for combat units.
Request acknowledged. Maintain a safe distance. The Zone mutates faster than we can measure.
Copy that. We'll post a two-man watch and rotate every hour. No one goes near it without orders.
That's protocol. We don't lose men to curiosity. Duty comes first. Always.
checkpoint,rotation,schedule,dolg
Why is Squad Delta still manning Checkpoint 3? Their rotation was due four hours ago.
Logistics error. New shift got rerouted to reinforce the northern bunker.
That’s unacceptable. Checkpoint fatigue leads to mistakes. Get a replacement squad in place immediately.
Already on it. Bravo Squad is prepping to redeploy. Should be in position within the hour.
Inform Delta Squad to stand down and proceed to rest cycle as soon as relieved.
maintenance,logistics,inspection,dolg
Reminder to all units: monthly weapon maintenance logs are due by 1800 hours tonight.
Understood. Our armorer is finalizing documentation now. We had two rifles flagged for parts replacement.
Make sure serial numbers match inventory. Last month’s audit turned up three undocumented sidearms.
Affirmative. We’ll verify everything before submission. No intention of giving the quartermaster another headache.
security,access,breach,dolg
Who authorized entry for the civilian technician at East Gate this morning?
Should have been escorted. I’ll pull the gate log and cross-check the access codes.
Don’t rely on verbal authorizations. If it’s not in the registry, it’s not approved. Period.
Understood. We’ll review camera footage as well. If the breach is confirmed, disciplinary measures will follow.
paperwork,incident,report,dolg
Your incident report from the warehouse patrol yesterday is missing timestamps and coordinates.
I’ll correct and resend. Thought the debrief covered it, but I understand it has to be official.
Everything needs to be written down. Field data feeds command decisions. Sloppy reports get people killed.
Roger. Will attach audio transcript from helmet comms as well for clarity.
idcard,administration,renewal,dolg
Reminder: all personnel must renew their base access cards by the end of the week. No exceptions.
Mine expired last month and nobody said a word. Nearly got locked out of the armory.
That’s on you. Notices were posted in the mess, comms, and morning briefing. Stay current or stay outside.
Copy that. Just booked my renewal slot. Not repeating that mistake again.
artifact,confiscation,procedure,dolg
Intercepted a Loner carrying three Moonlight artifacts near checkpoint Gamma. Claims they're "for research."
Standard confiscation protocol. Document his details and warn him about restricted zones.
He's demanding compensation. Says he risked his life for these.
The Zone doesn't issue refunds. Send him on his way before Freedom sympathizers show up.
mutant,incursion,containment,dolg
Bloodsucker pack breached perimeter fence Sector 5-East. Two casualties.
Seal the breach with flamethrower teams. Deploy UV spotlights along the wire.
Request permission to use experimental sonic emitters. Science Corps left them here for testing.
Negative. Stick to proven methods. We're soldiers, not lab rats.
deserter,hunt,discipline,dolg
Private Volkov failed to report for duty. Took his rifle and three magazines.
Track his implant signal. Last known contacts?
Was seen talking to Freedom scouts yesterday. Signal last pinged near Army Warehouses.
Assemble retrieval team. Alive if possible. Dead if necessary.
supply,shortage,rationing,dolg
Medkit inventory shows 40% deficit. Bandage stocks critical.
Blame the last emission. Half our shipments got fried in transit.
Implement tiered rationing. Combat units get priority. Admin staff can use field dressings.
Understood. Also confiscating civilian med supplies at checkpoints until further notice.
radiation,spike,protocol,dolg
Rad levels spiked 300% in northern sectors. Some areas hitting 50 roentgen.
Seal the area. Redirect all patrols. Update the hazard maps.
Ecologists are requesting access for readings. Standard denial?
Affirmative. Their curiosity isn't worth the decon procedures.
recruits,training,indoctrination,dolg
New recruit intake arriving tomorrow. Twenty candidates from Kyiv.
Schedule ideological briefing first. Weed out the glory-seekers and artifact hunters.
Already prepared the orientation videos. Including the... graphic ones from the '12 containment breach.
Good. They need to understand what we're fighting against.
sabotage,investigation,security,dolg
Anomaly detectors at Checkpoint 7 were tampered with. Showing false negatives.
Casualties?
One patrol walked into a vortex. Two dead, one critical.
Lockdown the base. Polygraph every technician who serviced those units.
propaganda,disinformation,freedom,dolg
Freedom's broadcasting new lies about us "hoarding artifacts." Civilians are buying it.
Standard anarchist tactics. Undermine authority, then exploit the chaos.
Request permission to jam their frequencies. At least near our checkpoints.
Denied. Let them talk. Our actions speak louder than their lies.
monolith,activity,threat,dolg
Monolith forces massing near the Red Forest. Unusually coordinated movements.
They're preparing for something. Increase drone surveillance.
Recommend preemptive artillery strike on their gathering points.
Negative. Conserve ammunition. Fortify our positions instead.
veteran,memorial,honor,dolg
Sergeant Petrenko didn't make it. Radiation poisoning from the Yantar mission.
Twenty-two years of service. Add his name to the Wall of Honor.
Request permission to recover his dog tags. The body's in a hot zone.
Denied. No more good soldiers die for sentimentality.
emission,preparedness,protocol,dolg
Emission probability at 65%. All patrols recalled per protocol.
Seal the bunkers. Double-check oxygen scrubbers.
Two squads still unaccounted for near the chemical plant.
Their implants show life signs. Lockdown proceeds as scheduled.
weapons,testing,experimental,dolg
New anomaly-suppression rounds arrived from Kyiv. Field tests scheduled.
Volunteers?
Already selected from disciplinary roster. They earn their way back to good standing.
Document everything. If these work, we can finally clear the Garbage bottleneck.
border,dispute,military,dolg
Ukrainian Army claims we overstepped the demarcation line near Agroprom.
Our maps show otherwise. Pull the satellite imagery from '17.
They're threatening to cut our supply route unless we withdraw.
Stand firm. They need our anomaly reports more than we need their bureaucracy.
psionic,defense,research,dolg
Science Division developed new psi-blockers. 80% effectiveness in trials.
Side effects?
Headaches, temporary blindness. Better than becoming Monolith puppets.
Issue to front-line units only. I want daily reports on efficacy.
containment,breach,emergency,dolg
Massive anomaly expansion in Sector 9! Perimeter fences melting like wax.
Evacuate all personnel to secondary positions. Prepare scorched-earth protocols.
Ecologists are screaming about data loss. Orders?
Let them scream. Human lives come before research notes.
equipment,complaint,bureaucracy,dolg
%speaker_first_name%, my squad's been requesting new body armor for three weeks. Still using plates with bullet holes.
Fill out form R-47B, not R-47A. That's why it keeps getting rejected.
There's a difference? They look identical.
R-47B is for combat-damaged equipment. R-47A is for standard wear. Bureaucracy keeps us organized.
Meanwhile, my men are patching armor with duct tape and prayers.
I'll expedite it through supply. But next time, read the damn forms.
casual,offtime,dolg
%speaker_first_name%, you joining us for cards tonight? Got that good vodka from the last supply run.
Can't. Drawing night watch again. Someone's got to keep Freedom from sneaking around.
Third night this week? You piss off the duty roster sergeant?
Mentioned his reports were getting sloppy. Guess this is my reward.
Hah! Never criticize the man who controls your sleep schedule.
civilians,checkpoint,frustration,dolg
Another group of tourists tried to bribe their way past Checkpoint 3. When will they learn?
What'd they offer this time?
Euros and some sob story about scientific research. Same shit, different day.
At least they didn't try to run the checkpoint like last month's group.
True. Cleaning bloodstains off the concrete is a pain.
Speaking of which, we need more warning signs. The current ones aren't clear enough.
"Trespassers Will Be Shot" seems pretty clear to me.
You'd think so, but civilians are dumber than mutants sometimes.
veterans,history,nostalgia,dolg
%speaker_first_name%, remember when we first set up the Rostok perimeter? Just tents and sandbags.
And that winter storm that nearly buried us. Lost three men to hypothermia.
But we held the line. No mutants got through. No artifacts smuggled out.
Now look at it. Concrete walls, automated turrets, proper barracks.
Progress through discipline. Though I miss the simplicity sometimes.
The mission's the same. Keep the Zone contained, keep humanity safe.
logistics,complaint,supplies,dolg
Supply convoy's late again. We're down to emergency rations.
Blame the bureaucrats in Kyiv. They think the Zone runs on paperwork.
Meanwhile, we're eating decade-old MREs and calling it gourmet.
At least it's not mutant meat like those Freedom degenerates.
Don't knock it till you've tried it... kidding! Protocol violation.
I'm reporting that joke to morale enforcement.
Come on, %speaker_first_name%, we're all hungry here.
recruits,hazing,training,dolg
The new recruits are here. Time for "orientation."
Going easy on them or full boot camp treatment?
Full treatment. One's already crying about missing his girlfriend.
The Zone doesn't care about your feelings, recruit!
Remember when they made us clean latrines with toothbrushes?
Builds character. And ensures they follow decontamination protocols.
Plus it's fun watching them realize this isn't a video game.
monolith,combat,debrief,dolg
Debrief on the Monolith engagement. They fought to the last man, as usual.
Fanatics. But their tactics are evolving. Using flanking maneuvers now.
%speaker_first_name%, you were on point. What's your assessment?
They're not just mindless anymore. Someone's teaching them real combat doctrine.
Ex-military joining their ranks?
Or they're learning from fighting us. Either way, we need new strategies.
I'll draft a report for command. This changes our threat assessment.
corruption,artifact,investigation,dolg
Internal Affairs is sniffing around. Someone's been skimming artifacts.
Shit. Any idea who?
They're looking at Checkpoint 5 staff. Three artifacts went "missing" last month.
%speaker_first_name%, weren't you stationed there?
Two weeks ago, yeah. Everything was clean on my watch.
Better have your paperwork straight. IA doesn't fuck around.
My logs are spotless. Can't say the same for the night shift though.
Throwing them under the bus already?
It's not throwing under if it's true. Duty before friendship.
medical,injury,concern,dolg
How's Volkov doing? Heard the medics worked on him for hours.
Lost his left eye, but he'll live. Lucky bastard.
Controller got him?
Shrapnel from his own grenade. Bounced off anomaly field.
Shit. That's why we follow engagement protocols.
He knows. Kept apologizing even while bleeding out.
checkpoint,tension,protocol,dolg
%speaker_first_name%, heard you had a situation at the checkpoint yesterday.
Group of Loners got aggressive when we confiscated their artifacts.
How aggressive?
One pulled a knife. Big mistake.
Casualties?
He'll be eating through a straw for a month. Others got the message.
Good. Can't show weakness at the checkpoints.
freedom,infiltration,security,dolg
Security briefing mentioned possible Freedom infiltrators among the new recruits.
Those anarchist bastards getting desperate?
Command thinks they want our patrol schedules and supply routes.
Let them try. Our screening process will catch them.
%speaker_first_name%, you trained some of the new batch. Notice anything odd?
One kid kept asking about "individual freedoms" during ideology class.
Red flag. Name?
Already reported to Internal Security. They're watching him.
food,morale,complaint,dolg
This fucking porridge tastes like wallpaper paste.
Nutrients over flavor, soldier. It keeps you alive.
I'd rather eat MREs. At least those pretend to have flavor.
Put in a form 22-C food quality complaint.
And wait six months for them to tell me to shut up and eat?
Welcome to military bureaucracy.
ecologists,cooperation,tension,dolg
Ecologists are complaining we're blocking their research again.
Good. Less eggheads poking anomalies means less containment breaches.
They claim their research could help us fight the Zone better.
We don't need to understand it. We need to contain it.
%speaker_first_name%, didn't you used to escort their teams?
Yeah. Lost two men because they "had to get closer" to an anomaly.
See? Their curiosity gets our people killed.
night,watch,story,dolg
Quiet night?
Too quiet. Makes me nervous.
Zone's always planning something when it's silent.
Saw some lights moving in the anomaly field. Didn't look natural.
Log it. Command tracks patterns in anomalous activity.
Already did. Third time this week, same sector.
%speaker_first_name%, you've been here longest. Ever see anything like that before?
Once. Right before a major emission. Stay alert.
combat,story,veterans,dolg
Tell the rookies about the Battle of the Barrier.
Which one? We've had five "Battles of the Barrier."
The one where Freedom tried to breach with technicals.
Ah, that clusterfuck. RPGs versus machine guns.
We held the line. Lost twelve men, but not one anarchist got through.
You manned the .50 cal that day, right?
Until it jammed. Finished with grenades and harsh language.
And that's why we do weapons maintenance twice daily now.
equipment,innovation,practical,dolg
Check out this modification. Rigged my detector to my helmet HUD.
That's against regulation equipment specs.
But it works. Hands-free anomaly detection.
Until it fries your brain when it malfunctions.
%speaker_first_name%, you're tech-savvy. What do you think?
Clever, but submit it for testing first. We're not Freedom cowboys.
loners,checkpoint,daily,dolg
Same group of Loners at the checkpoint again. Starting to recognize faces.
The ones who actually follow protocol?
Yeah. Even fill out the forms properly now.
See? System works when people follow it.
One even saluted yesterday. Probably ex-military.
Good. Maybe they'll spread the word. Compliance makes everyone's life easier.
promotion,politics,career,dolg
Heard Sergeant position is opening up in 2nd Platoon.
You putting in for it?
Maybe. Depends who else is competing.
Kozlov's definitely applying. Brown-noser's been prepping for months.
Let him. Merit speaks louder than ass-kissing.
In theory. But he golfs with the Lieutenant.
Where the fuck do you golf in the Zone?
Exactly my point. Politics over practicality.
drill,emergency,preparation,dolg
EMERGENCY DRILL! All units to containment positions!
Another drill? That's the third this week.
Command's spooked about something. This isn't normal.
%speaker_first_name%, what's your take?
Could be intel about a major emission. Or worse.
Worse than an emission?
Zone expansion. But that's just speculation.
Fuck. Better take these drills seriously then.
Always do. Preparation prevents catastrophe.
rookie,mistake,lesson,dolg
New kid almost caused a containment breach. Left the inner door open during shift change.
Please tell me nothing got through.
Lucky. Just some radiated air. But it could've been bloodsuckers.
What's his punishment?
Week of decontamination duty. He'll never forget protocol again.
Didn't you train that batch?
I did. Already scheduled remedial training for the whole group.
blackmarket,bust,internal,dolg
Internal Security just raided Barracks 3. Found a whole black market operation.
What were they selling?
Artifacts, ammo, even some of our night vision gear.
Fucking traitors. Who was running it?
Corporal Fedorov and two privates. Already in isolation.
Court martial?
Tomorrow. Colonel wants to make an example.
Good. Corruption weakens us more than any anomaly.
philosophy,purpose,doubt,dolg
Ever wonder if we're actually making a difference?
What brought this on?
Zone keeps growing. We keep losing people. Feels like bailing water from a sinking ship.
That's defeatist talk.
Just being realistic. How long can we hold?
As long as it takes. That's our duty.
Easy to say. Harder when you're writing death notifications.
I know. But what's the alternative? Let it spread unchecked?
No. You're right. Just... sometimes it weighs on you.
That's why we have each other. And vodka. Mostly vodka.
training,combat,preparation,dolg
Live fire exercise tomorrow. Urban combat scenario.
About time. Been too long since proper combat drills.
%speaker_first_name%, you're leading Blue Team, right?
Affirmative. Already scouted the killhouse layout.
Cheater. That's tactical preparation.
No such thing as cheating in combat. Only winning and dying.
weather,conditions,morale,dolg
This rain's been going for five days straight. Everything's molding.
Including my socks. Can smell them from here.
Put in a requisition for weather-resistant gear?
Did that. Got told to "adapt and overcome."
Classic quartermaster response.
How do you keep your gear dry?
Plastic bags and prayer. Mostly prayer.
civilian,incident,PR,dolg
That journalist is back, asking about the "excessive force" incident.
The one where we saved her cameraman from a pseudogiant?
She's calling it "militaristic overreach."
Her colleague would be calling it "lunch" if we hadn't intervened.
Try explaining that to someone who thinks the Zone is just "misunderstood."
Let PR handle it. We have real work to do.
rivalry,competition,morale,dolg
Alpha Squad's talking shit again. Say we're getting soft on checkpoint duty.
They're just mad we have the highest confiscation rate.
%speaker_first_name%, what should we do about it?
Challenge them to a combat drill. Loser pulls latrine duty for a month.
I like it. Official channels?
Of course. We're not Freedom barbarians.
anomaly,research,science,dolg
Science Division wants volunteers to test new anomaly-resistant fabric.
What happened to the last volunteers?
Still in medical. But they're "mostly" fine.
Define "mostly."
Minor burns, some hair loss. Nothing permanent... probably.
Hard pass.
base,improvements,morale,dolg
New rec room is finally open. Even has a working TV.
What channels do we get?
Static and propaganda. But it's something.
Better than staring at concrete walls.
%speaker_first_name%, you bringing that deck of cards?
Already there. Set up a tournament for tonight.
defense,planning,serious,dolg
Worst case scenario briefing tomorrow. Mandatory attendance.
The "what if the Zone breaches all containment" plan?
That's the one. Final defensive positions, scorched earth protocols.
Cheerful. Nothing like planning your last stand over breakfast.
Better to have a plan than die in chaos.
You've been through these before. They ever update them?
Every time we lose territory. So yes, frequently.
That's... not reassuring.
Reality rarely is. But we hold the line regardless.
Until we can't. Then we make them pay for every meter.
mutant,hunt,debrief,dolg
Hunter team, report. Did you clear the Chimera nest in the abandoned factory?
Affirmative. Two Chimeras neutralized. Den has been sanitized with incendiaries.
Our losses?
Kovalchuk took a claw to the leg, but he'll walk. No fatalities.
Acceptable losses. Return to base for debrief and re-arming. Good work.
ideology,loner,recruitment,dolg
Had another Loner at the gate, spouting Freedom's nonsense about the Zone's "gifts."
They never learn. Did you correct him?
Showed him pictures from the Yantar psi-disaster. He went quiet after that.
Words are cheap. The evidence of the Zone's threat is written in blood.
He took a recruitment pamphlet. Maybe we planted a seed of sense in him.
Doubtful. But it's our duty to try.
command,orders,strategy,dolg
New directive from the Colonel. We're reinforcing the perimeter near the Army Warehouses.
That's Freedom territory. Are we expecting an attack?
Command anticipates a surge in Monolith activity. We're cutting off their advance routes.
And if Freedom gets in the way?
They will be considered an obstacle to containment. Orders are to secure the line, no matter the cost.
memorial,loss,duty,dolg
Read the latest entry on the Wall of Honor. Corporal Misha. Good soldier.
He held the line against that pseudogiant pack. Saved his whole squad.
A worthy sacrifice. His actions protected the barrier.
This is why we fight. So fewer names have to go on that wall.
To duty. And to Corporal Misha.
bandits,security,probe,dolg
Patrol reports sporadic sniper fire from the abandoned construction site. Bandits.
Probing our response times. Trying to find a weakness.
Send a fireteam to suppress them. No need for a full assault.
Understood. Just enough force to remind them we have teeth.
Let them waste their ammo. We'll show them what real discipline looks like when they finally commit.
superstition,rookies,veterans,dolg
Caught one of the new guys throwing a bolt into an anomaly "for luck."
Heard about that. What'd you do?
Assigned him to latrine duty for a week. Luck doesn't clean toilets, but he will.
Good. Superstition is a liability. We rely on discipline and training, not fairy tales.
He'll learn. Either through protocol or through pain. The Zone provides both.
psychology,stress,mutants,dolg
Another patrol, another bloodsucker nest. I swear I can still hear them, even in the barracks.
That's the stress talking. The mind plays tricks out here.
Doesn't make it any easier. How do you deal with it?
Focus on the mission. Remember why we're here. We are the wall that keeps these nightmares contained.
The wall... Right. Focus on the wall.
comms,discipline,protocol,dolg
This is a general reminder: radio chatter is for official reports only. No personal conversations.
Someone's been telling jokes on the command channel again?
Worse. Arguing about a card game. An open channel is a security risk. Monolith listens.
Understood. Violators will be disciplined accordingly.
Keep the lines clear. A missed order could be a soldier's last.
veterans,change,history,dolg
Remember when the Garbage was just... garbage? Not this anomaly-ridden hellscape?
I remember. Back then, bandits were the biggest threat there. Simpler times.
Now you can't take three steps without a detector screaming at you. The Zone festers.
It's why our mission is more critical than ever. We don't just hold the line; we push back against the decay.
informant,intelligence,mistrust,dolg
A Loner is offering intel on a Mercenary contract. Wants safe passage and a case of ammo.
Mercs are secretive. The information is likely valuable, if it's real.
My thoughts exactly. Could be a trap.
Vet him. Check his story against our own recon. If it checks out, give him half the ammo up front, the rest after we confirm.
Understood. We don't pay for lies.
ambush,combat,bandits,dolg
The trap in the Dark Valley worked. Bandit patrol walked right into it.
Status?
Eight hostiles eliminated. No losses on our side. We recovered stolen military supplies.
Excellent work. Send a message: banditry in our sectors will be met with overwhelming force.
Message delivered, loud and clear.
security,leak,internal,dolg
Internal Security has locked down the comms archive. Rumor is there's a leak.
A leak to who? Freedom? Mercs?
They're not saying. But our last three patrols were hit with surgical precision. They knew our routes.
A traitor in our ranks is worse than a hundred mutants at the gate.
They'll find him. And when they do, it won't be a court martial. It'll be a firing squad.
freedom,ideology,contempt,dolg
Intercepted another one of Freedom's "open broadcasts." Talking about the Zone's "wondrous secrets."
Wondrous? Tell that to the families of people killed by anomalies and mutants.
They're children chasing butterflies in a minefield. Their idealism is poison.
Let them preach. Every time they lose a man to their own carelessness, our point is proven. Order saves lives. Chaos takes them.
equipment,maintenance,practical,dolg
My rifle jammed twice during the firefight at the farm. The dust here is murder on the mechanism.
Did you clean it this morning?
Of course I did. But after a six-hour patrol, it's already full of grit.
That's why we carry cleaning kits in the field. A five-minute breakdown can save your life. No excuses.
Understood. I'll strip it down now.
ecologists,escort,mission,dolg
Command assigned us escort duty. A science team wants to place sensors near the Wild Territory.
Eggheads... They're more dangerous to themselves than the mutants.
Orders are orders. Their research on anomaly patterns could give us a tactical advantage.
Fine. But they follow our rules. One step out of line and I'm aborting the mission. I'm not losing men for a damn data point.
debrief,tactics,learning,dolg
The firefight with the Mercs was sloppy. We took two injuries that were avoidable.
Agreed. Petrov's squad broke formation when they saw an opening. It exposed their flank.
Classic mistake. They got greedy for a kill.
We'll drill it into them. Fire discipline and maintaining formation are non-negotiable. We fight as a unit, or we die as individuals.
food,complaint,morale,dolg
Is it even possible for coffee to be this weak? It's like brown water.
It's for hydration, not pleasure. You want flavor, find an artifact.
A little caffeine would help on the night watch.
Your rifle is your caffeine. The threat of getting your throat torn out should keep you awake. Now stop complaining.
mutant,threat,recon,dolg
Recon team in the Red Forest reported a new mutant variant. Looks like a Snork, but faster and armored.
The Zone is always creating new horrors.
Any footage?
Just a blurred image before the drone was destroyed. Command wants a live specimen for study.
A "live specimen"? Easier said than done. Tell the capture team to bring heavy armor and a lot of ammo.
discipline,loners,warning,dolg
Saw a few of our guys trading stories with some Loners at the bar.
As long as they're not trading equipment or intel, it's fine. But keep an eye on it.
They were getting friendly. Laughing.
Friendship is a luxury we can't afford. Loners follow their own code, which means they have no code. A quiet word to the sergeant should be enough. Remind them who they fight for.
emission,lockdown,protocol,dolg
Another emission is coming. Sensors are going crazy.
All patrols are accounted for and returning to base. The outer blast doors are sealed.
What about the checkpoint garrisons?
They're in reinforced bunkers. They'll ride it out. It's standard procedure.
Let's hope the wiring holds this time. I don't want the lights going out again.
equipment,dispute,regulation,dolg
Ivanov took my spare magazine. Says he lost his.
Losing equipment is a disciplinary offense. He needs to report it to the quartermaster.
He won't. Says it's too much paperwork. I want my magazine back.
I'll handle it. Ivanov! My office. Now. And bring the magazine you "found."
monolith,propaganda,psychological,dolg
Found more Monolith propaganda near Pripyat. Strange symbols and promises of "enlightenment."
Burn it. Don't let the rookies see it.
One of them asked what it meant. I told him it was the ramblings of madmen.
That's exactly what it is. Their "enlightenment" is brainwashing. A bullet is the only cure for their faith.
combat,action,tactical,dolg
Contact! Bandits, east ridge, in the trees!
Suppressing fire! Squad Bravo, flank left!
Grenade out!
Target down! Moving up!
Hold the line! Don't let them break through!
rookie,commendation,combat,dolg
That new kid, Sasha. He held his ground when that pseudogiant charged.
I saw that. Didn't even flinch. Put three rounds right in its eye.
He's got potential. Most recruits just freeze.
I'll put a note in his file. Good performance under pressure should be recognized. He might make a soldier yet.
garbage,strategy,control,dolg
Why do we pour so many resources into controlling the Garbage? It's a toxic dump.
It's a crossroads. It connects Rostok to the rest of the Zone. Bandits, Freedom, Loners... they all have to pass through it.
So it's a chokepoint.
Exactly. Control the Garbage, and you control the flow of stalkers and artifacts. It's ugly, but it's strategically vital to our containment mission.
trap,distress,caution,dolg
We're picking up a distress call on an open channel. A Loner, says his team is pinned down by mutants in the Great Swamps.
The Great Swamps are Renegade territory. It's 90% likely to be a bandit trap.
And the other 10%?
Send a drone for aerial recon. No ground teams. We don't risk our lives for a fool's hope. If it's real, we'll reassess. If it's a trap, we mark their position for a later visit.
humor,cynical,veteran,dolg
Petrov is talking about what he'll do when he retires. Thinks he'll open a bar.
Retires? From Duty? What's that?
Exactly. There are two ways out of the Zone: in a body bag or as a deserter.
Tell him to name the bar "The Final Duty." It'll be a short-lived enterprise.
freedom,looting,contempt,dolg
Just confirmed. Freedom squads are picking over the battlefield where we fought the Monolith yesterday.
Vultures. We do the fighting, they pick the corpses clean for gear.
Should we engage?
Negative. Let them have the scraps. It saves us the trouble of sanitation. Just log it as another example of their "honor."
anomaly,hazard,warning,dolg
Warning to all patrols: the 'Burnt Fuzz' anomaly field in the Wild Territory has shifted. The old safe paths are gone.
How do we know?
A Loner squad was wiped out. Found their PDAs. They walked right into it.
Update the maps immediately. I want every squad leader to confirm they have the new data. We don't lose people to carelessness.
equipment,psionic,review,dolg
How's that new psi-helmet treating you? Science division says it should block Controller influence.
It works. Mostly. Instead of a voice in your head, it's just a dull migraine.
An improvement, then.
Definitely. I'd rather have a headache than an urge to shoot my squadmates. We should issue these to all front-line units.
training,rookie,lesson,dolg
A recruit asked me if he'd get a medal for clearing out a den of blind dogs.
What did you tell him?
I told him his reward for doing his job is getting to see tomorrow's briefing.
Good. We're not here for medals. We're here to do a job that nobody else can. The sooner they understand that, the longer they'll live.
confiscation,loner,humor,dolg
Had to confiscate something from a Loner today. Called it "Flesh jerky."
Don't tell me he was eating it.
He offered me a piece. Said it was "high in protein."
What did you do with it?
Sent it to the lab for analysis. And sent him to the medic for a psych evaluation. There are some lines you just don't cross.
bureaucracy,commendation,frustration,dolg
I put in a commendation for Corporal Morozov a month ago. He saved two men from a fire anomaly.
Still no word?
It got sent back. I filled out form 8-Bravo instead of 8-Charlie. "Incorrect Valor Classification."
Sometimes the paperwork is more dangerous than the Zone. Resubmit it. A man's bravery should be on the record, even if we have to fight the clerks to get it there.
military,border,tension,dolg
Army patrol is at the Cordon checkpoint. Their commander is demanding we hand over a Loner who crossed the perimeter.
On what grounds?
Says he's a deserter. The Loner says he finished his service years ago.
This is our jurisdiction. Tell the Major we will handle our own internal security. Thank him for his concern and politely tell him to stay on his side of the wire.
debrief,mutants,combat,dolg
Delta squad got ambushed by Snorks in the Agroprom underground.
Casualties?
Two wounded, but they got out. They used the tunnels to get behind the squad.
They're learning. It's not just animal cunning anymore. They're using tactics.
We need to update our engagement protocols for underground operations. Assume every vent is an attack vector.
monolith,ideology,futility,dolg
We captured a Monolith fighter. Tried to interrogate him.
Get anything out of him?
Nothing. Just stared blankly and chanted about the "Great Monolith." There's nothing human left in there.
It's a waste of time. They're not soldiers. They're puppets. The only information they have is how to die for their rock.
What are the orders?
End it. A bullet is a mercy.
memorial,honor,respect,dolg
General announcement: a memorial service for the soldiers lost in the last emission will be held at 1900 hours.
Attendance is mandatory for all off-duty personnel.
I'll be there. We need to honor them.
We honor them by continuing the mission. By ensuring their sacrifice was not in vain. But yes, we will stand for them tonight.
strategy,emission,tactics,dolg
Intelligence suggests a large mutant horde is nesting in the Dead City.
A direct assault would be costly. Too much rubble, too many ambush points.
The next emission is in 48 hours. If we place sonic lures, we can keep them from seeking shelter.
Use the Zone to cleanse itself. Brutal, but effective.
Authorize it. The Zone is a weapon. We will use it against its own creations.
blackmarket,intel,corruption,dolg
Our contact in the Loner community sent a report. Someone's selling Duty-issue body armor on the black market.
Check the serial numbers against our missing inventory.
They match the gear from the patrol that went missing last month. The one we thought was killed by anomalies.
So they were ambushed. And one of our own is profiting from their deaths.
Internal Security has the file. They'll find the rat.
ideology,purpose,resolve,dolg
Another day, another patrol. Sometimes it feels endless.
It is endless. The Zone doesn't sleep. So neither can we.
But are we winning?
Every day the outside world remains safe is a victory. Every mutant we kill, every anomaly we contain, every inch of ground we hold... that is winning.
So we keep fighting.
We are Duty. It's what we do. Now gear up. Your watch starts in five.
artifact,psi_field,research,freedom,restriction
Alert all teams! Massive psi-emissions in Jupiter's eastern warehouse complex. Feels like a goddamn kindergarten for Controllers.
Confirmed. My detector's screaming - but interference pattern suggests artifacts. Something new buried in that mess.
Duty patrols are setting up perimeter blocks 500m out. "For our safety". Bullshit! They want first dibs!
Typical Duty dogs. Since when do they care about safety? Remember what they did at the Burner anomaly?
Fuck their barricades. I've got experimental psi-blockers - jury-rigged but functional. Who's crazy enough to run the field with me?
Count me in. Knowledge should be free, not locked behind army wannabes. Recording equipment ready.
Bring extra bolts! We'll map safe paths and share coords openly. Let every stalker profit, not just duty's pet scientists.
Watch for Monolith zealots though. That much psi-energy might've drawn them like moths to a flame.
Standard procedure: shoot fanatics first, debate philosophy later. Meet at the crashed chopper in 20. Stay free, brothers!
supplies,bandits,reciprocity,freedom,ideology
Heads up: Bandits ambushed our medic supply run near the swamp bridge. Lost antibiotics and blood kits.
Those parasitic fucks! Kostya's leg wound's festering. He needs those meds NOW.
Check the freedom cache behind Yanov? Should be emergency stocks.
Already raided. Only empty syringes left. Fucking looters didn't even reseal the container.
I've got two vials of antibiotics. Not much, but take them. No "payment" needed - that's not how we operate.
Appreciated. Meanwhile, let's teach bandits mutual aid. I'll lead a team to their Dark Valley stash point.
Redistribute whatever we find to loners too. Show them true freedom means community, not extortion.
This is why Duty fails. You can't build walls against human need. We build networks.
Exactly. Meet at the burnt farmhouse at dawn. Bring non-lethals - some bandits just need bread before bullets.
artifact,ethics,experiment,freedom,loner
Just found a Fireball artifact fused to a dead rookie's hand near the Circus. Should we harvest it?
Christ. Another one who thought artifacts were toys. Leave it - that's a fucking grave marker now.
But the energy readings are off the charts! We could learn why it bonded permanently.
Learn by desecration? We're not Duty. Tag the body for Ecologists if you're so curious.
Compromise: photograph the fusion pattern, then bolt-burn the site. Knowledge without theft.
Better idea: post coordinates on the shared net. Let every stalker see what happens when you rush.
Now that's Freedom thinking! Turn tragedy into community education. I'll handle the upload.
mutant,evolution,swamp,warning,freedom
Swamp team report: Snorks are hunting in PACKS now. Saw three coordinate an ambush near the church.
Impossible. Snorks are solitary. You sure it wasn't just feeding frenzy?
Positive. One flushed me toward two others hiding underwater. Tactical behavior.
Zone's accelerating mutations. Last week blind dogs started climbing trees in Red Forest.
Share footage with Ecologists? They'll lock it behind "security clearance".
Fuck that. Upload raw vid to our public server. Every stalker deserves to know the new rules.
duty,conflict,border,freedom,standoff
Duty armored column moving toward our Yanov checkpoint! Six exos, two RPGs.
Over artifacts? Again? Let them come. We've got the height advantage and psy-block.
Stand down! It's about that missing patrol. They think we ambushed them near the train yard.
Bullshit. We were mapping anomalies all night. Tell them to check Monolith activity logs.
Too late. Voronin's transmitting: "Return our men or we burn your outpost."
Fucking fascists. I say we jam their COMs and release pseudodogs near their rear flank.
radio,broadcast,propaganda,freedom,recruitment
Freedom Radio test broadcast in 10! Who's got today's main segment?
Me. Exposing how Duty's "artifact seizures" end up in military black markets.
Save that for Wednesday. Today: guide to bypassing Army checkpoints using sewage tunnels.
Add a warning about bloodsuckers in Pipe sector. Two loners got drained yesterday.
End with recruitment pitch? "Tired of paying Duty protection? Fight back with Freedom!"
No. End with Strelok's old quote: "The Zone belongs to those who walk it, not cage it."
technology,heist,mercenaries,freedom,recovery
Confirmed: Mercs stole our prototype emitter from Jupiter lab. Tracking them toward Dead City.
That emitter disrupts brain scorcher fields! They'll sell it to highest bidder.
Assemble intercept team. Priority: recover tech intact. Secondary: leave no witnesses.
Secondary? Since when do we execute?
Since they murdered three scientists for it. This isn't theft - it's war.
anomaly,weather,research,freedom,emergency
EMERGENCY: Electro-storm forming over Truck Cemetery! Not natural - radiating from ground zero.
Fuck. That's where we stored the artifact resonance array. Did someone activate it?
Worse. Duty tried to dismantle it "for safety". Now it's overloading.
Evacuate nearby loners! Tell them to seek basement shelters immediately.
I'll lead a suicide team to plant ion disruptors. Volunteers?
Make it volunteer ONLY. No orders today - just free men saving free men.
supplies,hunger,community,freedom,ration
Last food shipment got destroyed by pseudogiants. We've got three days of rations max.
Open the communal kitchen to ALL stalkers. No Freedom ID checks.
That'll empty our stocks in hours! We need to prioritize fighters.
Bullshit hierarchy talk! We share or we become Duty. I'll donate my personal stash.
Organize hunting parties. Army Warehouses deer are still clean. Who knows radiation levels?
I'll test meat on myself first. Better radiation than watching kids starve at Skadovsk.
strelok,legend,rumor,freedom,investigation
Crazy report from newbie: saw a stalker in vintage SEVA suit walking THROUGH an anomaly at night.
Hallucination. Probably ate bad canned food.
But he described the patch: Clear Sky insignia with red stripe. That's Strelok's gear.
Don't spread ghost stories. Strelok's dead or worse - absorbed by the Zone.
Then why did all detectors flatline when he appeared? I'm investigating tomorrow.
Take backup! If it's REALLY him... he might know how to end this nightmare.
bandits,negotiation,truce,freedom,ambush
Bandit messenger at perimeter. Says their boss wants "temporary alliance" against Monolith.
Lies. They just want our northern tunnel access.
Actually... Monolith IS pushing hard into Dark Valley. Even bandits are fleeing.
So? Let fanatics kill parasites. Saves us bullets.
Unthinkable! If Monolith takes the valley, they flank OUR positions. Temporary truce?
Counter-proposal: We defend the valley TOGETHER, but bandits open all loot stashes to loners.
experiment,psy,risk,freedom,volunteer
Psy-blocker v2.0 ready for field test. 85% chance of permanent neural damage. Volunteers?
You're insane! That's suicide.
Not if it works. Imagine walking through Brain Scorcher unprotected! Ultimate freedom.
I'll do it. My brother's mindless near CNPP. If this saves others...
Log every sensation! Pain, whispers, time distortion - we'll broadcast findings live.
Duty would lock this research away. We risk everything for human knowledge. That's our creed.
defector,duty,interrogation,freedom,asylum
Duty lieutenant surrendered at gates earlier! Claims Voronin ordered execution squads for "weak" soldiers.
Fascist purge. Where's he now?
Medbay. Took three bullets escaping. Demands political asylum.
Could be trap. Duty loves false-flag ops.
Interrogation revealed something bigger: Duty's building a scalar weapon using artifacts.
Shit. If true, we must sabotage it. Freedom can't let them weaponize the Zone.
art,monolith,culture,freedom,preservation
Found something incredible in Pripyat hotel: murals painted with GLOWING pigments. Not radiation - actual art.
Monolith zealots? They decorate their shrines sometimes.
No. These show pre-Chornobyl life. Kids playing, forests... signed "S. Kaidanovsky".
A stalker artist? Before the second disaster?
We must preserve this! Duty will destroy it as "corrupting influence".
Document everything. Humanity isn't dead while we create beauty in hell.
anniversary,celebration,tradition,freedom,memory
Freedom Day tomorrow! Who's handling the "Wall of Names" ceremony?
Me. Added 17 new names this year... mostly lost to Duty raids.
Pour extra vodka for Luger. He held the bridge alone against Monolith in '24.
Play his final transmission during moment of silence: "Tell them I died free!"
New tradition: burn a Duty helmet in the bonfire?
No. We honor OUR dead, not obsess over enemies. That's what separates us.
weed,morning,casual,freedom
%other_first_name%, you got any of that good shit left from last night?
Brother, I'm already two joints deep into breakfast. Come by the fire.
This new strain hits different. Where'd you get it?
Growing it myself near that weird anomaly. The radiation does something beautiful to the THC.
Mutant weed? That's either genius or suicide.
Little bit of both. That's freedom, baby.
duty,mockery,humor,freedom
Saw some Duty boys marching in formation earlier. In the Zone. MARCHING.
Let me guess - perfect little lines until an anomaly scattered them?
Like roaches when you turn on the light. Beautiful chaos.
Those fascist pricks think discipline beats adaptation. Zone teaches otherwise.
Natural selection at its finest.
philosophy,zone,freedom
You ever think the Zone is just trying to communicate?
Pass that joint and elaborate, philosopher.
Like... anomalies are words, emissions are sentences. We just don't speak the language yet.
And Duty wants to silence it before we can learn. Typical authoritarian bullshit.
Exactly! They fear what they don't understand.
We embrace it. That's the difference between slaves and free men.
supplies,planning,casual,freedom
Who's making the booze run to Skinflint?
I'll go if someone covers my watch. Need rolling papers anyway.
Get some of those imported beers. Tired of this radioactive piss.
Radioactive piss builds character.
So does good beer. Don't forget the essentials - chips, chocolate, more papers.
What are we, teenagers? Get some real food too.
Fine, mom. I'll grab some tourist's delight.
combat,story,duty,freedom
You hear about Mongoose's squad hitting that Duty patrol?
The one near the barrier? That was beautiful.
Smoke grenades and speakers blasting music. Duty didn't know what hit them.
Psychological warfare at its finest. No casualties, just humiliation.
Best part - they filed a formal complaint about "unprofessional conduct."
Those uptight fucks. War doesn't have rules.
recruit,welcome,culture,freedom
New guy just showed up. Ex-Duty, believe it or not.
No shit? What's his story?
Said he got tired of polishing boots and following orders that got people killed.
One of us already. Get him high, loosen up that military programming.
Already on it. Kid's taking to freedom like he was born for it.
anomaly,beauty,philosophy,freedom
Spent all night watching that new spatial anomaly. It's like a living kaleidoscope.
The one that bends light into fractals?
Yeah. Most beautiful thing I've seen in years.
Duty would just see a threat to contain. We see art.
The Zone's a gallery and we're the only ones with eyes to appreciate it.
party,planning,morale,freedom
Three day weekend coming up. We throwing another rager?
Does a bloodsucker shit in the woods? Of course we are.
I'll handle music. Got a new sound system off some dead mercs.
I'll cook. Thinking mutant boar BBQ.
Invite those cool loners from the north camp?
Everyone's welcome except Duty. This is FREEDOM, baby!
weapons,modification,freedom
Check out this mod - turned my AK into a full-auto shotgun.
That's either brilliant or retarded. Probably both.
Kicks like a pseudogiant but clears rooms beautifully.
Let me guess - accuracy of a drunk bloodsucker?
Who needs accuracy when you're painting the whole wall?
hangover,party,humor,freedom
Anyone else's head feel like a whirligig anomaly?
That's what happens when you mix artifact vodka with Zone shrooms.
Worth it. I saw the meaning of existence for like... five minutes.
What was it?
Fuck if I remember. But it was profound.
ecologists,cooperation,science,freedom
Those eggheads want escort to the anomaly fields again.
They paying in artifacts or cash?
Better - they're sharing their research on psi-protection.
Now we're talking. Knowledge should be free anyway.
Unlike Duty hoarding their data, we actually help progress.
zone,changes,observation,freedom
%other_first_name%, you notice the Zone feels different lately?
Like it's more... alive? Yeah, I feel it too.
Anomalies are moving, forming patterns. It's responding to something.
Or someone. Maybe it knows Duty's planning something big.
The Zone protects itself. We just need to listen.
And be ready to protect it back if needed.
artifacts,trade,business,freedom
Got three Moonlights and a Stone Flower. Looking to trade for ammo.
I'll give you 500 rounds of 5.45 for one Moonlight.
Fair deal. What about the Stone Flower?
Save it. Heard they neutralize radiation when worn right.
Good looking out, brother.
military,conflict,tactics,freedom
Military's setting up a new checkpoint near our supply route.
Those government dogs never learn.
Want to make their lives difficult?
Already on it. Lured a pack of blind dogs near their position last night.
Guerrilla tactics. Love it.
They'll abandon it within a week. Zone doesn't like occupiers.
philosophy,debate,ideology,freedom
Had an argument with a Dutyer yesterday about human nature.
Let me guess - he thinks people need to be controlled?
Exactly. Said without rules, we'd all turn into animals.
Meanwhile we're here, free as fuck, and more human than his robotic ass.
Freedom doesn't create chaos. It reveals who you really are.
And most Duty boys are just scared little fascists underneath.
mutants,coexistence,philosophy,freedom
That pseudodog pack's back. Still not attacking anyone.
Told you feeding them would work.
They even warned us about that Duty patrol yesterday.
See? Coexistence is possible. The Zone's creatures aren't all mindless.
Try explaining that to trigger-happy Duty.
prank,duty,humor,freedom
Got an idea. What if we paint "FREEDOM RULES" on the Duty barracks?
In bright pink. I like it.
Better - use that glow-in-the-dark artifact paint.
They'll see it for weeks! When do we strike?
Tonight. They have that boring ceremony at 2100.
Perfect. I'll bring the spray cans and joints for the mission.
music,culture,freedom
Need new tunes. This playlist is getting stale.
I got a trader bringing Western music next week.
Rock? Metal? Please say psychedelic.
All of it. Freedom means choices, brother.
Unlike Duty's one approved marching song.
injury,recovery,brotherhood,freedom
How's the leg, %other_first_name%? Saw you take that hit.
Doc patched it up. Got some good painkillers too.
The medical grade stuff or the "fun" stuff?
Both. Doc knows how we roll.
That's why I love this faction. We take care of our own.
loners,recruitment,freedom
That group of loners has been hanging around more.
They're cool. Share their stash, don't start shit.
Think they want to join up?
Maybe. Or they just like our parties and ideology.
Either way, more friends in the Zone is always good.
Except Duty. Fuck those guys.
equipment,sharing,community,freedom
My detector's fucked. Anyone got a spare?
Take mine. I'm staying in camp today anyway.
Thanks brother. I'll bring you back something nice.
Just bring yourself back. Gear's replaceable, people aren't.
exploration,discovery,adventure,freedom
Found a new area past the Red Forest. Completely untouched.
Artifacts?
Everywhere. But also weird shit. Trees growing in spirals, gravity pools.
Sounds like the Zone's showing off.
Want to check it out tomorrow? Bring the whole squad?
Hell yeah. Adventure and artifacts. Perfect day.
defector,duty,conversion,freedom
Another Duty defector showed up. Third this month.
Their fascist paradise cracking?
Kid said he joined to fight the Zone, realized he was just oppressing people.
Takes balls to admit you were wrong and change.
Yeah. Let's show him what real brotherhood looks like.
Get him stoned and tell him about anarchist theory.
One joint at a time, we'll deprogram that military bullshit.
combat,duty,victory,freedom
Heard about the barrier fight yesterday?
We pushed those Duty fucks back three checkpoints!
Should've seen their faces when the smoke cleared.
Best part - we did it without killing anyone. Just superior tactics.
They rely on formation. We use creativity.
Guerrilla warfare beats goose-stepping every time.
personal,philosophy,freedom
You know what I love most about Freedom?
The weed?
Besides that. Nobody tells me who to be.
No uniforms, no saluting, no bullshit hierarchy.
Just people choosing to work together because they want to.
That's real strength. Not fear, not orders. Choice.
night,watch,casual,freedom
Taking night watch. Anyone want to keep me company?
I'll join. Bringing cards and that bottle of whiskey.
My man. Beats staring at darkness alone.
Plus two sets of eyes see more than one.
Especially after a few drinks.
monolith,encounter,philosophy,freedom
Ran into some Monolith yesterday. Weird fucking experience.
Those brainwashed zombies give me the creeps.
Thing is, one of them was trying to talk. Like really talk, not preach.
What'd he say?
Something about "the chains breaking." Then his buddies shot him.
Fuck. Even their freedom isn't free.
Makes you appreciate what we have here.
artifacts,research,discovery,freedom
Been experimenting with artifact combinations. Found something wild.
Don't blow yourself up, scientist.
If you wear a Moonlight with a Stone Blood, they resonate.
Resonate how?
Creates a field that slows down time. Or speeds you up. Not sure which.
That's some Matrix shit right there.
Sharing this with everyone. Knowledge wants to be free.
supplies,sharing,community,freedom
Found a military supply drop. Intact.
What's in it?
MREs, ammo, medical supplies. Enough for the whole camp.
Beautiful. Their loss, our gain.
Already bringing it back. Party tonight to celebrate?
Every night's a party when you're free!
trading,business,relations,freedom
Hawaiian's prices are getting stupid. We need a new dealer.
What about that guy in Yanov?
Too far. Plus he's sketchy as fuck.
Maybe we start our own trading post?
Free market, fair prices. I like it.
No taxes, no markup. Just honest trade.
That's the Freedom way.
meditation,spiritual,zone,freedom
Spent the morning meditating by the anomaly field.
High or sober?
Stone cold sober. The Zone has its own high if you listen.
What'd you hear?
Everything. Nothing. The space between thoughts.
Deep. Pass whatever you're smoking.
I'm serious! Try it sometime. The Zone speaks to those who listen.
propaganda,duty,counter,freedom
Duty's spreading rumors we're just drug addicts playing soldier.
Let them talk. Actions speak louder.
Still pisses me off. We protect more stalkers than they do.
Because we don't shake them down at checkpoints.
Should we counter with our own propaganda?
Nah. Living well is the best revenge.
Plus we're too stoned to organize a propaganda campaign.
Fair point!
bloodsucker,encounter,survival,freedom
Holy shit, %other_first_name%, heard you tangled with a bloodsucker!
Fucker jumped me during my morning piss.
How'd you survive?
Threw my joint at it. Thing paused, confused. Gave me time to grab my shotgun.
Death by confusion. I love it.
Even bloodsuckers don't know what to make of us.
future,plans,dreams,freedom
What's your endgame here? Can't fight for freedom forever.
Why not? It's not about winning, it's about living free.
But imagine if we actually pushed Duty out completely.
Then we'd have to deal with the military directly.
Bring it on. The Zone belongs to those who understand it.
Not those who fear it.
Exactly. We're not just fighting Duty. We're fighting ignorance.
One joint and one bullet at a time.
morning,routine,casual,freedom
Beautiful morning in the Zone, brothers!
Someone's cheerful. Good night?
Great night. Stars were out, anomalies were singing.
And you were high as a satellite.
That too. But mostly just grateful to be alive and free.
I'll smoke to that.
artifact,discovery,sharing,freedom
Found something incredible. An artifact that enhances perception.
Like getting high?
Better. You can see electromagnetic fields, hear ultrasonic frequencies.
The Zone's showing us how to really see it.
This is huge. We could understand anomalies better.
Already shared the location with everyone. Let's all expand our minds.
camp,improvements,community,freedom
That new shower setup is fucking amazing.
Hot water in the Zone. We're living like kings.
Duty's still using buckets and complaining about protocol.
See what happens when people cooperate instead of following orders?
Progress through freedom.
rookie,advice,wisdom,freedom
New kid's asking for Zone survival tips.
Tell him the most important rule.
Don't be a dick?
That, and the Zone respects those who respect it.
Fear it and it'll eat you. Try to control it and it'll crush you.
But approach with wonder and respect...
And it might just let you live free.
politics,anarchy,philosophy,freedom
Been reading that anarchist theory book you lent me.
Kropotkin? Good shit, right?
Mutual aid makes so much sense. We're already living it.
Exactly. No rulers, just people helping people.
Meanwhile Duty thinks hierarchy is natural law.
Only thing natural about hierarchy is it naturally fucks people over.
combat,philosophy,tactics,freedom
You know why we keep beating Duty in skirmishes?
Superior firepower?
Nah. We fight for something we believe in.
They fight because they're ordered to.
Free men fight harder than slaves.
Plus we're usually high, so we're unpredictable as fuck.
That too. Chaos is our ally.
zone,gift,spiritual,freedom
The Zone gave me a gift today.
Artifact?
Better. Understanding. Saw how anomalies are connected.
Like a web?
Like neurons. The Zone's a living brain and we're inside it.
That's either profound or you need to lay off the shrooms.
Both can be true.
equipment,modification,creativity,freedom
Check out my new rig. Detector built into my gas mask.
That's some cyborg shit.
Hands-free anomaly detection. Innovation through necessity.
Duty would call that "non-regulation."
Duty can regulate deez nuts.
Share the design. Others might want to build one.
Already posted blueprints in the workshop. Knowledge is freedom.
celebration,victory,party,freedom
Heard from the front that we pushed Duty back from the warehouse district!
Fuck yes! This calls for a celebration.
Already rolling the victory joints.
I'll get the sound system set up.
Someone grab the good vodka from the stash.
Tonight we party like the free men we are!
philosophy,freedom,conclusion,freedom
If the Zone taught me anything, it's that freedom isn't free.
But it's worth every fucking bullet.
Every scar, every lost friend.
Because at the end of the day, we chose this.
Nobody ordered us. Nobody controls us.
We're free men in a free Zone.
And that's worth more than all Duty's rules and regulations.
To freedom, brothers.
To fucking freedom!
morning,philosophy,zone,freedom
I saw the sun rising over the anomaly fields. Beautiful and terrifying.
Just like freedom itself.
ecologist,cooperation,science,freedom
Ecologists want to study our artifact collection.
They sharing their findings?
Full transparency. Unlike Duty's classified bullshit.
Knowledge should be free. Let's do it.
Maybe they'll figure out how to enhance our weed with artifacts.
Now you're thinking like a scientist!
territory,expansion,strategy,freedom
That old military base would make a great outpost.
It's in the contested zone though.
So? We contest it. That's what we do.
Duty won't like us expanding.
When have we ever cared what Duty likes?
Fair point. Let's scout it tomorrow.
Bring the whole squad. Make it a field trip.
mutant,research,understanding,freedom
Been studying controller behavior. They're smarter than we think.
Smart enough to fuck with your head.
But what if we could communicate instead of just killing them?
You want to chat with controllers?
Why not? We coexist with pseudodogs already.
Controllers are different. They see us as prey.
Maybe because we always shoot first.
You're either brilliant or insane.
In the Zone, what's the difference?
resources,sharing,community,freedom
Medical supplies are running low again.
I've got extra bandages. Take what you need.
Thanks brother. I'll hit you back when the next shipment comes.
No debts between free men. Just help the next person.
This is why we're stronger than Duty's hoarding.
Mutual aid in action.
revelation,understanding,freedom
I finally get it. The Zone isn't our enemy.
Never was. Duty just can't see it.
It's testing us. Seeing if humanity can evolve.
And we're the ones passing the test.
By embracing change instead of fighting it.
By being free enough to adapt.
The Zone doesn't need to be contained.
It needs to be understood.
And we're the only ones listening.
To freedom and understanding, brothers!
problem,creative,humor,freedom
The generator's busted again. We're out of fuel and spare parts.
Didn't we "liberate" some electro artifacts from that Duty convoy?
You want to power the base with a fucking unstable anomaly? You're insane.
Insanely brilliant! We can finally power the sound system for a proper party!
If the base explodes, I'm blaming you.
It's not an explosion, it's just spontaneous, radical deconstruction. That's freedom, baby!
loner,help,community,freedom
Found a loner bleeding out near the swamps. Bandits got him.
He still breathing?
Barely. Got him to our medic. He'll live.
Good work. Duty would have asked for his papers first.
A man's life is worth more than a fucking form. We help anyone who isn't trying to cage the Zone.
weed,casual,philosophy,freedom
I've done it. I have rolled the perfect joint.
What makes it so perfect, oh wise one?
Perfectly cylindrical, burns evenly, and has a pinch of dried, non-hallucinogenic Zone moss for flavour.
You smoked Zone moss? Are you trying to grow a third eye?
A third eye would be useful for watching my back. Now, are you gonna share this spiritual experience or not?
artifact,risk,adventure,freedom
Intel says a Goldfish artifact spawned in the Red Forest after the last emission.
The Red Forest is a meat grinder. Controllers and Chimeras everywhere.
High risk, high reward, brother. That artifact could fund us for a year.
Fuck it, I'm in. Better to die free and rich than live bored and broke.
That's the spirit! Gear up, we move at dawn.
information,sharing,duty,freedom
Just mapped a new safe path through the Jupiter underground. Uploading it to the general stalker network.
Duty would classify that shit and use it for their own gain.
Exactly. Information isn't a weapon, it's a tool for survival. It should be free for all.
Except for bandits. Hope the map has a few... creative typos for them.
Let's just say the version they'll find leads to a very thirsty bloodsucker family.
music,party,morale,freedom
Guitar's tuned, speakers are jury-rigged to that artifact battery. We're having a concert tonight!
Fuck yes! What are you playing?
Some old protest songs. Seem fitting for us.
Duty has their marches. We have rock and roll. I know who'd win that fight.
monolith,pity,ideology,freedom
We captured a Monolith fanatic. Kid couldn't have been more than eighteen.
Did you get any intel?
Nothing. Just stared right through me, mumbling about his stupid rock. There was nothing left in his eyes.
It's a fucking tragedy. The Brain Scorcher steals their freedom, turns them into puppets.
We just... let him go. Couldn't bring myself to shoot him. It felt like putting down a sick animal.
You did the right thing. We fight to free minds, not execute the enslaved.
stash,hiding,humor,freedom
Need to hide my stash. Duty's been sniffing around.
I use an old, irradiated toilet. Nobody ever checks inside a radioactive shitter.
That is disgustingly brilliant.
Thanks. The key is to think like nobody wants to think.
zone,nature,philosophy,freedom
Duty calls the Zone a wound. An infection to be purged.
They're fucking morons. It's not a wound, it's a new ecosystem.
It's change. Raw, chaotic, beautiful change. And it terrifies them.
You can't put evolution in a cage. We're not fighting to destroy the Zone, we're fighting to be part of it.
retreat,tactics,duty,freedom
We're pulling back from the checkpoint. Duty's brought in an APC.
We're just giving it to them?
It's not a retreat, it's a strategic relocation of the party. Let them have the concrete block.
We know three other ways through this valley. They'll be sitting there bored while we're still moving freely.
Heh. Let them guard an empty road. The ultimate victory.
memorial,loss,story,freedom
It's been a year since Luka bought it at the barrier.
Fuck. Feels like yesterday. I can still hear his stupid laugh.
Remember when he tried to teach a pseudodog to fetch? Almost worked, too.
He died free, doing what he loved: pissing off Duty.
Let's roll one for Luka tonight. The big, crazy bastard.
food,experiment,humor,freedom
Okay, I tried it. Fried up some of those weird blue mushrooms.
And? Are you dead?
Not dead. But I can taste colours now. And my rifle is giving me some solid life advice.
Fuck yeah. Save some for me.
bandits,close_call,survival,freedom
Bandits tried to ambush my supply run. Fucking amateurs.
You okay?
Fine. I just acted like I was a rookie, started crying and begging. They got cocky and came closer.
And then?
Then my "crying" turned into a grenade pin being pulled. They didn't find it so funny after that.
zone,sound,meditation,freedom
Just sit and listen. Forget the gunfire for a second.
Hear what?
The hum. The whole Zone hums at a low frequency. It's like... the planet breathing.
Dude, you've been smoking that Zone moss again, haven't you?
Maybe. But I'm not wrong.
propaganda,prank,duty,freedom
Found another one of Duty's "Join to Save Humanity!" posters.
Did you fix it?
Of course. I crossed out "Humanity" and wrote "Your Commanding Officer's Ego."
Also gave the guy on the poster a handlebar mustache and a joint.
Doing the Zone's work, my friend. Doing the Zone's work.
liberation,supplies,military,freedom
That military truck that tipped over? It's full of vodka.
We're not stealing it.
Of course not. We are liberating it from the chains of state oppression.
And we will redistribute this liberated wealth... amongst ourselves.
I love it when you talk political.
peace,quiet,casual,freedom
Emission just passed. Everything's quiet. Clean.
Yeah. The five minutes before the mutants start crawling out again.
Let's just enjoy it. This is why we fight. For these moments.
Pass the joint. Let's really enjoy it.
anomaly,new,discovery,freedom
Found a new anomaly. Looks like a floating bubble of water.
Did you throw a bolt in it?
Yeah. The bolt aged. Rusted to dust in seconds.
A time anomaly? Fuck that. I'm not getting old and grey just trying to grab an artifact.
But imagine the possibilities! I'm going back with more sensors.
You crazy beautiful bastard. Don't die.
loner,defense,community,freedom
Bandits are planning to hit the loner camp in the Garbage tonight.
Those guys are good people. We can't let that happen.
Not our fight, is it?
Freedom for one is freedom for all. If we don't protect the weak, we're no better than Duty.
...Fine. But we're "helping" them set up defenses, not fighting their war for them.
Teach a man to fish... or in this case, teach a man to build a fucking minefield. Let's go.
life,philosophy,ideology,freedom
My brother back home thinks I'm insane for living here.
He's the one living in a cage with a mortgage and a shitty boss.
Here, every day is a choice. Every meal is earned. Every friendship is real.
He thinks we're running from something. We're running TO something.
To the truest form of existence. This is life, unfiltered.
experiment,failure,humor,freedom
Okay, so trying to cook sausage with a burner anomaly was a bad idea.
Let me guess. It's now a radioactive, charcoal briquette?
It's now a small, angry, sentient charcoal briquette that screams at me.
...Can we keep it?
recruitment,ideology,freedom
Hey loner, tired of bandits taking your shit and Duty telling you where to walk?
There's another way. The Zone doesn't need masters.
Come hang with us. The only rule is there are no rules.
And we've got way better weed than those other uptight fucks.
fight,ideology,duty,freedom
Some days I get tired of fighting Duty.
Then remember why we do it. Remember their checkpoints, their restrictions, their fear.
They want to turn this miracle into a prison.
We're not just fighting men in armor. We're fighting the idea that people need to be caged.
And that's a fight worth fighting.
standoff,military,defiance,freedom
Military chopper's circling. They're telling us to surrender the base.
Tell them to come down and discuss it over a joint.
They're not joking. They've got rocket pods armed.
So do we. This is free territory. They can have it when they pry it from our cold, dead, thoroughly relaxed hands.
meal,community,sharing,freedom
Just bagged a boar. Who wants BBQ?
Fuck yeah! I'll grab the potatoes!
Someone get the guitars out! This is a feast!
Go invite the loners nearby. Nobody eats alone when Freedom's cooking.
shortcut,risk,anomaly,freedom
I know a shortcut through the Jupiter plant. Cuts travel time in half.
Isn't that area crawling with Electro anomalies?
Yeah, but if you time it right, you can run between the pulses. It's like a dance.
A dance with death. You first.
Living on the edge is the only way to know you're alive, brother.
zone_gift,hallucination,weird,freedom
Woke up this morning and all the trees were whispering my name.
That's usually a bad sign.
Nah, it was chill. They were giving me stock market tips.
The fuck is a stock market?
No idea, but I feel like I should be investing in something called... squirrel pelts?
Lay off the mushrooms, man.
dead,respect,philosophy,freedom
Found a dead Dutyer. Left his dog tags on a rock.
You didn't take his gear?
Nah. He was an enemy, but he was a man. We're not fucking bandits.
Even in war, you can have a code.
Our code is freedom. His was blind obedience. But we're all just meat for the Zone in the end.
bandits,encounter,humor,freedom
Some bandits tried to set up a checkpoint on our road. "Cheeki breeki," the whole show.
How'd that work out for them?
We set up our speakers and blasted death metal at them. They got confused and ran away.
Never underestimate the power of superior culture.
beauty,zone,peace,freedom
After the acid rain, the whole forest was glowing. Every leaf, every branch.
Radioactive but beautiful.
Exactly. You can find beauty even in the most dangerous places, if you're free enough to look.
Duty would just see a hazard to be "sanitized."
Their loss. More wonder for us.
plan,simple,tactics,freedom
Okay, here's the plan to take that outpost. It's complicated, so listen up.
Hit me.
We get really, really high, and then we charge in screaming. They won't know what the fuck to do.
...It's the best plan I've heard all day. Let's do it.
hierarchy,anarchy,philosophy,freedom
That new guy keeps calling me "sir."
Tell him if he does it again, you'll make him polish your rifle with his tongue.
I told him we don't have sirs here. Just brothers. He looked confused.
It'll take time to wash the boot polish out of his brain. Be patient with him.
mystery,zone,unexplained,freedom
The compasses are spinning near the old substation. All of them.
Magnetic anomaly?
Something more. It feels like the Zone's holding its breath right there.
Could be a new path opening. Or a new way to die.
Only one way to find out. Who's got the longest rope?
defiance,duty,ideology,freedom
Duty command broadcast an ultimatum: "Surrender your weapons and submit to Zone authority."
Hah! Did we reply?
Yeah. We broadcasted an hour of a pseudogiant snoring right over their frequency.
A perfect, non-violent act of absolute contempt. Beautiful.
promise,future,hope,freedom
Look at them. Loners, ex-Duty, scientists... all sharing the same fire.
This is what we're fighting for. Not a territory, not an artifact.
A place where people can just... be. Without some asshole in a uniform telling them how.
It's not perfect. It's chaotic and dangerous as hell.
But it's ours. And it's free.
And it's worth every single fucking fight. To freedom, brothers.
orders,protocol,army
All units, maintain perimeter security. No unauthorized personnel beyond the checkpoint.
Copy that, command. Rules of engagement if stalkers approach?
Warning shots first. We're here to contain the Zone.
Understood. Holding position and following protocol.
equipment,supplies,army
Supply convoy arriving at 1400 hours. All squads prepare to receive ammunition.
Finally! We've been running low on 5.45 rounds.
Government keeping us well-supplied, unlike these ragtag stalkers.
checkpoint,procedure,discipline,military,protocol
Checkpoint Alpha to Command: Why are we processing stalkers without biometric scans? SOP requires verification.
Command to Alpha: Scanner damaged during emission. Temporary exception authorized by Lt. Kovalchuk.
Sir, that's how contraband gets through! Saw Freedom scout with bulging backpack yesterday.
Maintain visual inspection only. Replacement parts delayed in Kyiv bureaucracy. Welcome to the Zone.
Understood. Request permission to implement manual pat-downs. These anarchists exploit weaknesses.
artifact,confiscation,quota,military,procedure
Patrol 7 reporting: Confiscated three Jellyfish artifacts from Loner group near Agroprom.
Documented properly? Last shipment had missing paperwork. Science Corps is furious.
Affirmative. Photographed with owners before seizure. One resisted - now in detention.
Good. Remember: Monthly quota is 20 artifacts minimum. Command pressures us for results.
Understood. Suggest raiding Bandit stash in Dark Valley. Intel suggests they're hoarding.
mutant,containment,protocol,military,emergency
URGENT: Pseudogiant breached outer perimeter near Cordon! Engaging with heavy weapons!
Command authorizes RPGs. Do NOT let it reach outskirt areas. Containment priority one!
Target down! But... it was wearing military dog tags. Serial number matches Corporal Ivanov.
Jesus. He disappeared during Yantar mission last month. Document everything and incinerate remains.
Sir, the mutation rate... if this spreads beyond Zone perimeter...
Classified conversation only. Report to debriefing room immediately. This never happened.
duty,cooperation,alliance,military,strategy
Joint op with Duty at 0600. Secure northern anomaly cluster for Ecologist study.
Why work with those fanatics? Last joint patrol ended with three men "accidentally" grenaded.
Kyiv's orders. Their anomaly detectors are superior. Maintain professional distance.
desertion,manhunt,traitor,military,punishment
ALERT: Private Volkov deserted with night vision gear and encryption codes. Last seen near Garbage.
Track him. Shoot on sight if resisting. Codes compromise entire northern network.
Dogs lost his scent near Freedom territory. Intercepted comms suggest they're offering him asylum.
Contact Svoboda command: Return traitor immediately or we cut their Yanov supply route.
They refuse. Volkov claims "political persecution". Request permission for extraction raid.
corruption,supplies,investigation,military,blackmarket
Inventory discrepancy: 2000 rounds 5.45mm missing. Third shortage this month.
Check Sergeant Petrenko's logs. His patrols always coincide with Bandit market days.
Confirmed. Thermal drone shows him meeting Bandit leader "Skull" near abandoned factory.
Apprehend quietly. Interrogate before he contacts accomplices. This goes to Kyiv's ears only.
Sir... he's requesting emergency extraction. Claims to be undercover intelligence asset.
monolith,intelligence,psychic,military,threat
Recon team found Monolith psionic transmitters in Red Forest. Advanced design.
Science Corps analysis: Tech matches pre-disaster military prototypes. How did they get it?
Intercepted transmission: "Project Cradle active". Sound familiar? Chernobyl incident files.
Classify Level Gamma. This suggests external support for Monolith. Possible sabotage.
Recommend immediate drone strike on transmitter cluster. Before they activate full network.
interrogation,stalker,intelligence,military,torture
Prisoner #42 cracked. Gave coordinates to Freedom's main artifact cache in Jupiter.
Verification? Last "confession" led us into an anomaly field.
Drone thermal scan matches description. Heavy guard presence. Worth the risk?
Prepare raid team. Capture leader "Chekhov" alive - he knows their supply networks.
And the prisoner? He's begging for amnesty.
Standard disposal. We don't waste medical resources on terrorists.
border,breach,containment,military,emergency
BREACH ALERT: Southern fence section destroyed! Multiple stalker groups flooding through!
Containment protocol Zulu! Seal sector 9! Authorize lethal force!
Sir - it's not stalkers... mutants! Bloodsucker pack breached the barrier!
How?! Fence has 10,000V current! Unless... internal sabotage?
Forensic team found cut wires. Professional job. Duty insignia nearby.
radiation,containment,emergency,military,evacuation
Radiation spike in sector 5! Levels exceeding Chernobyl '86 readings!
Source? Ecologists promised containment after last emission.
Unauthorized artifact drilling by Bandits. They punctured a radioactive burial mound.
Evacuate nearby villages! Deploy chemical battalions for decon. Shoot looters on sight.
Wind carries fallout toward Kyiv in 72 hours. Requesting national emergency protocols.
conscription,protest,morale,military,discipline
New conscripts refusing patrol duty. Claim "suicide mission" after Delta squad's wipeout.
Court martial the ringleaders. We need examples during wartime.
Sir, they're teenagers. Saw their friends mutated last week. Morale is critical.
Rotate them to checkpoint duty. Double rations for volunteers to Red Zone patrols.
No volunteers. Suggest... alternative motivation? Bandit prisoners need "disposal".
duty,betrayal,ambush,military,retaliation
Ambush confirmed: Duty units fired on our convoy near Rostok. Three vehicles destroyed.
Casualties? This violates the non-aggression pact!
12 dead. They stole artifact shipment for Science Corps. Voronin claims "preemptive strike".
Scramble attack helicopters! Level their checkpoint at Army Warehouses!
Command vetoed. Kyiv orders restraint. "Alliance more important than revenge."
evacuation,classified,retreat,military,coverup
EYES ONLY: Operation CLOAK commences at 2300. Destroy all classified materials.
Evacuation? But command said hold the perimeter at all costs!
New intelligence: Second Chernobyl-level event imminent. We're abandoning outer sectors.
What about the Ecologists? The stalker settlements?
No warnings. Plausible deniability. God have mercy on their souls.
Look! Loner wandering near the reeds. Looks lost.
He's ours. I'll take the left flank. You flush him out.
Fuck flanking. Just shoot the bastard. His gear looks like shit anyway.
Fine. My bullet, my loot. You can have his boots if they fit.
failure,blame,anger,killer
He got away! You shot like a blind dog, you useless fuck!
Me? You were supposed to cut him off! You tripped on your own dick!
Next time I'm using you for bait. At least you're good at screaming.
Shut up! Both of you! There's another one coming. Don't fuck this one up.
loot,argument,greed,killer
That medkit is mine! I saw it first!
You can't even fucking read! I killed him, I get his shit!
Want to settle this with knives, then?
Both of you give me the fucking medkit. Now. Or I'll use it to patch up what's left of you.
territory,threat,hostile,killer
Someone's coming. Smells like Clear Sky.
Fuck those swamp pricks. This is our mudhole.
Fire a warning shot?
Warning shots are for pussies. Shoot to kill. They'll get the message.
mutants,fear,chaos,killer
FUCK! Snorks! In the fucking camp!
Shoot them! Shoot them you idiots!
I'm out of ammo!
Then throw a fucking rock! Every man for himself!
diplomacy,threat,crude,killer
Loner wants to pass. Says he'll pay.
Take his money.
Then what?
