Then we shoot him and take the rest of his shit. What kind of fucking question is that?
deal,betrayal,bandit,killer
That Bandit trader sold us watered-down vodka!
Even the regular bandits hate us. Fucking snobs.
Next time we see him, we take his stall. And his kneecaps.

food,mutant,disgusting,bandit

scars,boasting,violence,bandit

injury,medical,crude,bandit

loners,hatred,contempt,bandit

rat,traitor,violence,bandit

mercs,contempt,mockery,bandit

ambush,spot,planning,bandit

drunk,philosophy,crude,bandit

Nope. So stop thinking about skimming, you greedy fuck.
loot,division,violence,bandit

good_day,success,gloating,bandit

anomaly,superstition,crude,bandit

corpse,mocking,disrespect,bandit

You're a sick bastard.

recruitment,pitch,crude,bandit

party,planning,violence,bandit

law,code,simple,bandit

hangover,crude,complaint,bandit

chimera,fear,panic,bandit

turf_war,brewing,violence,bandit

hazing,rookie,cruel,bandit

anthem,philosophy,crude,bandit

Negative. Premature data risks panic. Monitor and log any... unfortunate test subjects.

Ethical reminder: Destroy all samples if military inspectors arrive. This research stays unpublished.

Recall everyone except Station 7. They’re shielded. We need real-time emission scans.

mutation,radiation,study,ecologist,ethics

Praise the Monolith! Its light guides us through darkness!

defense,prophecy,attack,monolith,preparation

Let them come. The anomalies hunger for their flesh.

Place Fireballs in their path. Let purification come through flame.

A wolf in sheep's clothing. The emitter will reveal his impurity.

Extract everything. Then give him to the bloodsuckers. They hunger.

emission,prophecy,storm,monolith,warning

Praise the coming purge! Our holy barriers will protect the faithful.
The outsiders flee like rats. Their machines fail as the Voice promised.
Gather the newly awakened. Their baptism in radiation begins at dawn.

artifact,holy,ritual,monolith,blessing

All tests are the Monolith's will. Those who perish were unworthy.
traitor,punishment,example,monolith,justice

Bind him to the reactor fence. Let the Zone reclaim its wayward child.

technology,defilement,cleansing,monolith,heresy

Their "drones" shall fall like all others. The anomalies hunger for such toys.

prophecy,dream,omen,monolith,revelation

intruders,defense,attack,monolith,repel

convert,enemy,psy,monolith,rebirth

prophecy,voice,command,monolith,destiny

baptism,radiation,initiation,monolith,purge

eclipse,prophecy,reckoning,monolith,endtimes

Confirmed. Anomaly density increased 47% since last week. Lebedev won’t like this.

Then we move now. Before Duty or Freedom get involved.

Freedom’s offering a temporary truce. They want access to our emission data.

Their scouts will report Monolith movements. We need eyes everywhere.
Fine. But no artifact trades. We’re not turning into Bandits.
freedom,negotiation,truce,csky

And in return?
Their scouts will report Monolith movements. We need eyes everywhere.
Fine. But no artifact trades. We’re not turning into Bandits.
mutant,research,specimen,csky

duty,conflict,border,csky

tech,failure,repair,csky

storm,radiation,evacuation,csky

Evacuate all field teams. Seal the bunkers.

…Pray they find cover.
traitor,leak,investigate,csky

Who had access?
Only inner circle. But one of the new recruits was ex-Freedom.
Interrogate him. If guilty, he answers to Lebedev.
artifact,experiment,risk,csky

Lead-lined chamber, remote sensors. But we need a live test.
…Do it. But evacuate the east wing first.
monolith,scout,threat,csky

supplies,ration,emergency,csky

Prioritize field teams. Everyone else gets basics only.

Then we start trading artifacts. Survival comes first.
rescue,loner,ethics,csky

Maybe. But it’ll burn half our detector stock.
Do it. We’re not Monolith—we don’t leave people to die.
emission,prediction,urgency,csky

…Strelok. Warn all teams. The Zone’s about to erupt.
duty,truce,research,csky
Duty’s offering shared anomaly data—if we give them our emission research.

Memory loss, nosebleeds. But he’s alive.

zone,expansion,warning,csky

50 meters this month. If it keeps going, Cordon will be uninhabitable in a year.
